cabinet

n (c)

    1. (= cupboard) 贮(貯)藏橱(櫥) (zhùcáng chú) (个(個), gè)
    2. (= display cabinet) 陈(陳)列柜(櫃) (chénliè guì) (个(個), gè)
  2. (Pol) 内(內)阁(閣) (nèigé)

comic

adj

  1. (also comical) 滑稽的 (huájī de)
  2. [actor, opera] 喜剧(劇)的 (xǐjù de)

n (c)

  1. (= comedian) 喜剧(劇)演员(員) (xǐjù yǎnyuán) (个(個), gè)
  2. (Brit, = magazine) 连(連)环(環)漫画(畫) (liánhuán mànhuà) (幅, fú)
    美 = comic book

inspiring

adj

  1. 鼓舞人心的 (gǔwǔ rénxīn de)

vt

  1. [person] 激励(勵) (jīlì)
  2. [work of art] 给(給)予灵(靈)感 (jǐyǔ línggǎn)
  3. [confidence, hope, respect] 唤(喚)起 (huànqǐ)
    to inspire sb to do sth 鼓舞某人做某事 (gǔwǔ mǒurén zuò mǒushì)

preventive

adj

  1. [measures, medicine] 预(預)防的 (yùfáng de)

shipping

n (u)

  1. (= business) 航运(運) (hángyùn)
  2. (= cost of transport) 船运(運)费(費) (chuányùn fèi)
  3. (= ships) 船舶 (chuánbó)

n (c)

  1. 船 (chuán) (艘, sōu)

utter

adj

  1. (= total) [amazement, nonsense, fool] 绝(絕)对(對)的 (juéduì de)

vt

  1. (liter) [sounds, words] 说(說) (shuō)

bond

n (c)

  1. (= link) [of affection etc] 纽(紐)带(帶) (niǔdài) (根, gēn)
  2. (Fin) 公债(債) (gōngzhài)

vi

  1. to bond (with) [mother] [child] (与(與)) ... 联(聯)结(結) ((yǔ) ... liánjié)
  2. [material] 黏合 (niánhé)

clarify

vt

  1. 澄清 (chéngqīng)

discriminate

vi

  1. to discriminate between two things 区(區)别(別)两(兩)种(種)事物 (qūbié liǎng zhǒng shìwù)
  2. to discriminate against/in favour of sb 歧视(視)/特别(別)优(優)待某人 (qíshì/tèbié yōudài mǒurén)

illuminate

vt

  1. [room, street, building] 照明 (zhàomíng)
  2. (= explain) 解释(釋) (jiěshì)

prince

n (c)

  1. 王子 (wángzǐ) (位, wèi)

violate

vt

  1. [law, agreement] 违(違)背 (wéibèi)
  2. [peace, privacy] 侵犯 (qīnfàn)
  3. [tomb] 亵(褻)渎(瀆) (xièdú)

complication

n

  1. (c/u) (= problem) 问(問)题(題) (wèntí)
  2. (c) (Med) 并(並)发(發)症 (bìngfāzhèng)

depict

vt

  1. (in picture) 描绘(繪) (miáohuì)
  2. (= describe) 描述 (miáoshù)

minus

n (c)

  1. (also minus sign) 负(負)号(號) (fùhào)
  2. (= disadvantage) 不足 (bùzú)

prep

  1. (inf, = without) 没(沒)有 (méiyǒu)
    12 minus 3 (is or equals 9) 12减(減)3(等于(於)9) (shí'èr jiǎn sān (děngyú jiǔ))
    minus 24 (degrees C/F) (temperature) 零下24(摄(攝)氏/华(華)氏度) (língxià èrshísì (shèshì/huáshì dù))
    minus 24 (Math) 负(負)24 (fù èrshísì)
    B minus (Scol) B减(減) (bì jiǎn)

surgeon

n (c)

  1. 外科医(醫)师(師) (wàikē yīshī) (位, wèi)

appendix

n (c)

  1. (Anat) 阑(闌)尾 (lánwěi)
  2. (to publication) 附录(錄) (fùlù)
    to have one's appendix out 切除阑(闌)尾 (qiēchú lánwěi)

illuminate

vt

  1. [room, street, building] 照明 (zhàomíng)
  2. (= explain) 解释(釋) (jiěshì)

prosperous

adj

  1. [person, business, city] 繁荣(榮)的 (fánróng de)

recognizable

adj

  1. 可辨认(認)的 (kě biànrèn de)

atom

n (c)

  1. 原子 (yuánzǐ) (个(個), gè)

map

n (c)

  1. 地图(圖) (dìtú) (张(張), zhāng)

vt

  1. (= make a map of) 绘(繪)制(製) ... 的地图(圖) (huìzhì ... de dìtú)

provocative

adj

  1. [remark, article, behaviour, action] 挑衅(釁)的 (tiǎoxìn de)
  2. (sexually) [clothing, behaviour, gesture] 挑逗的 (tiǎodòu de)

vicinity

n

  1. in the vicinity (of) 在( ... )附近 (zài ( ... ) fùjìn)

breakthrough

n (c)

  1. (achievement) 重要成果 (zhòngyào chéngguǒ) (项, xiàng)
  2. (progress) 突破性进(進)展 (tūpòxìng jìnzhǎn) (次, cì)

census

n (c)

  1. 人口调(調)查 (rénkǒu diàochá) (次, cì)

disguise

n

  1. (c) (= make-up, costume) 伪(偽)装(裝)品 (wěizhuāngpǐn) (件, jiàn)
  2. (u) (= art) 乔(喬)装(裝)打扮 (qiáozhuāng dǎban)

vt

  1. (to be) disguised (as sth/sb) [person] 假扮成(某物/某人) (jiǎbàn chéng (mǒuwù/mǒurén))
  2. [fact, emotions] 掩饰(飾) (yǎnshì)
  3. [voice] 伪(偽)装(裝) (wěizhuāng)
    in disguise 乔(喬)装(裝)着(著) (qiáozhuāng zhe)
    there's no disguising the fact that ... 毫不隐(隱)瞒(瞞)事实(實)真相 ... (háo bù yǐnmán shìshí zhēnxiàng ... )
    to disguise o.s. (as sb) 把自己假扮(成某人) (bǎ zìjǐ jiǎbàn (chéng mǒurén))

politician

n (c)

  1. 政治家 (zhèngzhìjiā) (位, wèi)

yesterday

adv

  1. 昨天 (zuótiān)
    ⇒ She left yesterday. 她昨天走的。 (Tā zuótiān zǒu de.)

n (u)

  1. 昨天 (zuótiān)
    all day yesterday 昨天一整天 (zuótiān yī zhěngtiān)
    the day before yesterday 前天 (qiántiān)
    yesterday morning/afternoon 昨天上午/下午 (zuótiān shàngwǔ/xiàwǔ)

arouse

vt

  1. [anger, interest, passion] 激起 (jīqǐ)
  2. to be aroused (sexually) 被激起情欲(慾) (bèi jīqǐ qíngyù)
  3. (frm, from sleep) 唤(喚)醒 (huànxǐng)

comfortably

adv

  1. [sit, settle] 舒服地 (shūfu de)
  2. [live] 宽(寬)裕地 (kuānyù de)
  3. to be comfortably off 生活宽(寬)裕 (shēnghuó kuānyù)

explosive

adj

  1. [device, effect] 爆炸的 (bàozhà de)
  2. (fig)
    1. [situation, issue] 爆炸性的 (bàozhàxìng de)
    2. [person, temper] 暴躁的 (bàozào de)

n (c/u)

  1. (= substance, device) 炸药(藥) (zhàyào) (种(種), zhǒng)

fantastic

adj

  1. (= wonderful) [person, film, meal] 极(極)好的 (jí hǎo de)
  2. (= enormous) [sum, amount, profit] 力争(爭) (jùdà de)
  3. (= strange, incredible) (also fantastical) 荒诞(誕)的 (huāngdàn de)

inhabit

vt

  1. 居住 (jūzhù)

irrigation

n (u)

  1. 灌溉 (guàngài)

landmark

n (c)

  1. (= building, hill etc) 界标(標) (jièbiāo) (个(個), gè)
  2. (fig) 里程碑 (lǐchéngbēi) (座, zuò)

confer

vt

  1. (frm)
    to confer sth (on sb) [power, authority, status] 授予(某人)某物 (shòuyǔ (mǒurén) mǒuwù) [advantage, benefit] (给(給)某人)带(帶)来(來)某物 ((gěi mǒurén) dàilái mǒuwù) [degree] 授予(某人)某物 (shòuyǔ (mǒurén) mǒuwù)

vi

  1. to confer (with sb about sth) (就某事和某人)商议(議) ((jiù mǒushì hé mǒurén) shāngyì)

abbr

  1. (= confer) 比较(較) (bǐjiào)

industrialized

adj

  1. 工业(業)化的 (gōngyèhuà de)

mill

n (c)

  1. (for grain) 磨坊 (mòfáng) (个(個), gè)
  2. (for coffee, pepper) 碾磨器 (niǎnmòqì) (个(個), gè)
  3. (= factory) 厂(廠) (chǎng)

vt

  1. (= grind) [grain, flour] 磨 (mò)

motif

n (c)

  1. (= design) 基调(調) (jīdiào) (种(種), zhǒng)
  2. (= theme) 主题(題) (zhǔtí) (个(個), gè)

multiply

vt

  1. (Math)
    to multiply sth (by sth) (某数(數))乘以某数(數) ((mǒushù) chéng yǐ mǒushù)

vi

  1. (= increase) 增加 (zēngjiā)
  2. (= reproduce) 繁殖 (fánzhí)
  3. (Math) 做乘法 (zuò chéngfǎ)

recreation

n (u)

  1. 消遣 (xiāoqiǎn)

surge

n (c)

  1. (in demand, interest) 急剧(劇)上升 (jíjù shàngshēng)
  2. (in flow) 汹(洶)涌(湧) (xiōngyǒng)
  3. [of emotion] 一阵(陣) (yī zhèn)
    a surge of electricity 电(電)涌(湧) (diànyǒng)

vi

  1. [water] 奔腾(騰) (bēnténg)
  2. [people, vehicles] 涌(湧) (yǒng)
  3. [level, rate] 急剧(劇)上升 (jíjù shàngshēng)
  4. (liter) [emotion] 翻腾(騰) (fānténg)
  5. (Elec) 突然增加 (tūrán zēngjiā)
    to surge forward 蜂拥(擁)向前 (fēngyōng xiàng qián)

unavailable

adj

  1. [product, book] 不可获(獲)得的 (bùkě huòdé de)
  2. [person] 联(聯)系(繫)不上的 (liánxì bù shàng de)
    to be unavailable for comment 无(無)法发(發)表评(評)论(論) (wúfǎ fābiǎo pínglùn)

antiquity

n

  1. (u) (= the past) 古代 (gǔdài)
  2. (c) (= old object) 古物 (gǔwù) (件, jiàn)

astonishing

adj

  1. 惊(驚)人的 (jīngrén de)
    I find it astonishing that ... 我对(對) ... 感到惊(驚)讶(訝) (wǒ duì ... gǎndào jīngyà)

vt

  1. 使惊(驚)讶(訝) (shǐ jīngyà)

blanket

n (c)

  1. (for bed) 毛毯 (máotǎn) (床, chuáng)
  2. [of snow, fog] 层(層) (céng)

adj

  1. (= comprehensive) [ban, coverage] 全面的 (quánmiàn de)

vt

  1. [snow] 覆盖(蓋) (fùgài)

descend

vt

  1. (frm) [stairs, hill] 下 (xià)

vi

  1. (frm, = go down) 下来(來) (xiàlái)
  2. to descend (on/upon sb/sth) [calm, hush, gloom] 向(某人/某物)袭(襲)来(來) (xiàng (mǒurén/mǒuwù) xílái) [visitors, tourists] 突然涌(湧)向(某人/某地) (tūrán yǒngxiàng (mǒurén/mǒudì))
    to be descended from [person] 是 ... 的后(後)裔 (shì ... de hòuyì) [animal] 由 ... 演变(變)而来(來) (yóu ... yǎnbiàn ér lái)
    to descend to sth/to doing sth [lying, begging etc] 屈尊于(於)某事/做某事 (qūzūn yú mǒushì/zuò mǒushì)
    in descending order 按递(遞)减(減)的顺(順)序 (àn dìjiǎn de shùnxù)

execute

vt

  1. [person] 将(將) ... 处(處)死 (jiāng ... chǔsǐ)
  2. (frm) [plan, order] 实(實)行 (shíxíng)
  3. [manoeuvre] 完成 (wánchéng)

hemisphere

n (c)

  1. (Geo) 半球 (bànqiú) (个(個), gè)
  2. [of brain] 大脑(腦)半球 (dànǎo bànqiú)
    the northern/southern hemisphere 北/南半球 (běi/nánbànqiú)

nurture

vt

  1. [child, talent, relationship, new player] 培养(養) (péiyǎng)
  2. [plant] 培育 (péiyù)
  3. [hopes, ambition, dream] 抱有 (bàoyǒu)

oppress

vt

  1. 压(壓)迫 (yāpò)

piano

n (c)

  1. 钢(鋼)琴 (gāngqín) (架, jià)

confer

vt

  1. (frm)
    to confer sth (on sb) [power, authority, status] 授予(某人)某物 (shòuyǔ (mǒurén) mǒuwù) [advantage, benefit] (给(給)某人)带(帶)来(來)某物 ((gěi mǒurén) dàilái mǒuwù) [degree] 授予(某人)某物 (shòuyǔ (mǒurén) mǒuwù)

vi

  1. to confer (with sb about sth) (就某事和某人)商议(議) ((jiù mǒushì hé mǒurén) shāngyì)

abbr

  1. (= confer) 比较(較) (bǐjiào)

discipline

n

  1. (u) [of children, pupils] 纪(紀)律 (jìlǜ)
  2. (u) (= self-control) 约(約)束 (yuēshù)
  3. (c) (= branch of knowledge) 学(學)科 (xuékē) (门(門), mén)

vt

  1. (= train)
    to discipline o.s. (to do sth) 训(訓)练(練)自己(做某事) (xùnliàn zìjǐ (zuò mǒushì))
  2. (= punish) 惩(懲)处(處) (chéngchǔ)

pit

n (c)

  1. (= coal mine) 矿(礦)井 (kuàngjǐng) (个(個), gè)
  2. (= hole in ground) (road) 坑 (kēng) (个(個), gè)
  3. (also gravel pit) 采(採)石场(場) (cǎishíchǎng) (个(個), gè)
  4. (US, = fruit stone) 核(覈) (hé)
  5. (also orchestra pit) 乐(樂)队(隊)池 (yuèduìchí)

vt

  1. to pit one's wits/skills against sb 与(與)某人较(較)量才智/技能 (yǔ mǒurén jiàoliàng cáizhì/jìnéng)

pool

n

  1. (c) (= pond) 水塘 (shuǐtáng) (个(個), gè)
  2. (c) (also swimming pool) 游(遊)泳池 (yóuyǒngchí) (个(個), gè)
  3. (fig)
    pool of light/blood 一滩(灘)亮光/血 (yī tān liàngguāng/xiě)
  4. (c) (= amount, number)
    1. [of cash] 公库(庫) (gōngkù)
    2. [of secretaries, workers, vehicles] 储(儲)备(備) (chǔbèi)
  5. (c) (Cards, = kitty) 全部赌(賭)注 (quánbù dǔzhù)
  6. (u) (= game) 美式台(臺)球 (měishì táiqiú)

vt

  1. [money, knowledge, resources, ideas] 集中 (jízhōng)

salary

n (c/u)

  1. 薪水 (xīnshuǐ) (份, fèn)
    to be on a good/modest salary 拿高薪/适(適)中的薪水 (ná gāoxīn/shìzhōng de xīnshuǐ)

siege

n (c)

  1. 围(圍)困 (wéikùn)
    to lift a siege 解围(圍) (jiěwéi)
    to be under siege 被围(圍)困 (bèi wéikùn)
    to lay siege to [police, soldiers] 围(圍)攻 (wéigōng) [journalists] 包围(圍) (bāowéi)

speculate

vi

  1. (Fin) 投机(機) (tóujī)
  2. to speculate (about) 猜测(測)(关(關)于(於) ... ) (cāicè (guānyú ... ))
    to speculate that ... 推测(測) ... (tuīcè ... )

theatrical

adj

  1. [event, production, performance] 戏(戲)剧(劇)的 (xìjù de)
  2. (fig) [gesture, behaviour] 矫(矯)揉造作的 (jiǎo róu zào zuò de)

wording

n (u)

  1. 措辞(辭) (cuòcí)

n

  1. (c) 词(詞) (cí) (个(個), gè)
  2. (s) (= promise) 诺(諾)言 (nuòyán)
  3. (u/s) (= news) 消息 (xiāoxi)

vt

  1. 措辞(辭) (cuòcí)
    what's the word for "pen" in French? "钢(鋼)笔(筆)"这(這)个(個)词(詞)在法语(語)里(裡)怎么(麼)说(說)？ ("gāngbǐ" zhège cí zài Fǎyǔ li zěnme shuō?)
    word for word (= verbatim) 一字不变(變)地 (yī zì bù biàn de) (in translation) 逐字地 (zhú zì de)
    to put sth into words 用语(語)言表达(達)某事 (yòng yǔyán biǎodá mǒushì)
    not a word 一句也不 (yī jù yě bù)
    in a word 简(簡)而言之 (jiǎn ér yán zhī)
    in other words 换(換)句话(話)说(說) (huàn jù huà shuō)
    to have a word (with sb) (和某人)谈(談)谈(談) ((hé mǒurén) tántan)
    to have words (with sb) (和某人)争(爭)论(論) ((hé mǒurén) zhēnglùn)
    I'll take your word for it 我相信你说(說)的话(話) (wǒ xiāngxìn nǐ shuō de huà)
    by word of mouth 口头(頭)地 (kǒutóu de)
    a word of warning/thanks etc 警告/感谢(謝)等的话(話) (jǐnggào/gǎnxiè děng de huà)
    the last word 定论(論) (dìnglùn)
    in so many words 直截了当(當)地 (zhíjié-liǎodàng de)
    to break one's word 食言 (shíyán)
    to give sb one's word 对(對)某人许(許)下诺(諾)言 (duì mǒurén xǔ xià nuòyán)
    to keep one's word 遵守诺(諾)言 (zūnshǒu nuòyán)
    to send word of sb/sth 转(轉)告某人/某事的消息 (zhuǎngào mǒurén/mǒushì de xiāoxi)
    to leave word (with sb/for sb) that ... (通过(過)某人/给(給)某人)留个(個)口信儿(兒) ... ((tōngguò mǒurén/gěi mǒurén) liú gè kǒuxìnr ... )

amendment

n (c/u)

  1. (to law) 修正 (xīuzhèng)
  2. (US)
    the First/Second Amendment (to US Constitution) 第一/二修正案 (Dìyī/èr Xiūzhèng'àn)
  3. (to letter, essay etc) 修改 (xiūgǎi)

attentive

adj

  1. (= intent) [audience] 聚精会(會)神的 (jù jīng huì shén de)
    1. (= polite, helpful) [person] 体(體)贴(貼)的 (tǐtiē de)
    2. [service] 周到的 (zhōudào de)
      he is attentive to his wife 他对(對)妻子很体(體)贴(貼) (tā duì qīzi hěn tǐtiē)

cavity

n (c)

  1. (frm)
    1. (in wall, tooth) 洞 (dòng) (个(個), gè)
    2. (in body) 腔 (qiāng)

computing

n (u)

  1. 计(計)算机(機)运(運)用 (jìsuànjī yùnyòng)
    1. (also computing studies) 计(計)算机(機)学(學) (jìsuànjīxué)

cpd

  1. [course, skills] 电(電)脑(腦) (diànnǎo)

Jew

n (c)

  1. 犹(猶)太人 (Yóutàirén) (个(個), gè)

nitrogen

n (u)

  1. 氮 (dàn)

ball

n (c)

  1. (= football, golf ball etc) 球 (qiú) (个(個), gè)
  2. [of wool, string] 团(團) (tuán) (个(個), gè)
  3. (= sphere) 球状(狀) (qiúzhuàng) (个(個), gè)
  4. (= dance) 舞会(會) (wǔhuì) (个(個), gè)
  5. [of foot, thumb] 弯(彎)腰靠近 (qiúxíng bùfen)

vt

  1. [paper, cloth] (also ball up) 把 ... 抟(摶)成团(團) (bǎ ... tuánchéng tuán)
    to start or get or set the ball rolling 开(開)始 (kāishǐ)
    to play ball (with sb) (inf, fig) (与(與)某人)协(協)作 ((yǔ mǒurén) xiézuò)
    to be on the ball 敏锐(銳) (mǐnruì)
    the ball is in your court 轮(輪)到你了 (lún dào nǐ le)
    to have a ball (inf) 过(過)得愉快 (guò de yúkuài)

charter

vt

  1. 包租 (bāozū)

n (c)

  1. 宪(憲)章 (xiànzhāng)

epic

n (c)

  1. (= book, film, poem) 史诗(詩) (shǐshī)

adj

  1. [journey] 英雄的 (yīngxióng de)

monarchy

n

  1. (u) (= system) 君主制 (jūnzhǔzhì)
  2. (c) (= country) 君主制国(國)家 (jūnzhǔzhì guójiā) (个(個), gè)
  3. the monarchy (= royal family) 皇室 (huángshì)

muscular

adj

  1. [person, body] 肌肉发(發)达(達)的 (jīròu fādá de)
  2. [pain, weakness] 肌肉的 (jīròu de)

uncover

vt

  1. (= remove covering from) 露出 (lòuchū)
  2. (= discover) [plot, evidence] 发(發)现(現) (fāxiàn)

hire

vt

  1. (esp Brit)
    1. [car, equipment, hall] 租用 (zūyòng)
    2. [worker] 雇(僱)用 (gùyòng)

fifteenth

num

  1. 第十五 (dìshíwǔ)

funny

adj

  1. (= amusing) 可笑的 (kěxiào de)
  2. (= strange) 奇怪的 (qíguài de)
    to feel funny (inf, = unwell) 稍感不适(適) (shāo gǎn bùshì)

irreversible

adj

  1. [damage, change] 不可扭转(轉)的 (bù kě niǔzhuǎn de)

migrant

n (c)

  1. (= person) 移民 (yímín) (个(個), gè)
  2. (= animal) 迁(遷)徙动(動)物 (qiānxǐ dòngwù)

cpd

  1. [worker] 流动(動) (liúdòng)
  2. [animal] 迁(遷)徙 (qiānxǐ) (次, cì)

overlook

vt

  1. (= have view over) 俯瞰 (fǔkàn)
  2. (= fail to notice) 忽略 (hūlüè)
  3. (= forgive) 宽(寬)容 (kuānróng)

portrayal

n (c)

  1. (= depiction) 描述 (miáoshù)
  2. (actor's) 表演 (biǎoyǎn) (场(場), chǎng)

furthermore

adv

  1. 此外 (cǐwài)

resign

vt

  1. [one's job] 辞(辭)去 (cíqù)

vi

  1. 辞(辭)职(職) (cízhí)
    to resign o.s. to sth [situation, fact] 听(聽)任某事 (tīngrèn mǒushì)

align

vt

  1. [objects] 对(對)齐(齊) (duìqí)
    to align o.s. with sb 与(與)某人结(結)盟 (yǔ mǒurén jiéméng)

bypass

n (c)

  1. (Aut) 旁道 (pángdào) (条(條), tiáo)
  2. (Med, = operation) 分流术(術) (fēnliúshù)

vt

  1. [town] [road, driver] 绕过(過) (ràoguò)
  2. (= ignore) [person, problem etc] 避开(開) (bìkāi)

misunderstood

pt, pp

  1. of misunderstand

adj

  1. 被误(誤)解的 (bèi wùjiě de)

vt, vi

  1. 误(誤)解 (wùjiě)

offshore

adj

  1. [rig, wind, fishing] 离(離)岸的 (lí'àn de)
  2. [company, bank, investment] 海外的 (hǎiwài de)

adv

  1. 近海地 (jìnhǎi de)

plea

n (c)

  1. (= request)
    plea (for sth) 恳(懇)求(某事) (kěnqiú (mǒushì))
  2. (Law, in court) 抗辩(辯) (kàngbiàn)
  3. (= excuse) 托词(詞) (tuōcí) (种(種), zhǒng)
    a plea for help 请(請)求帮(幫)助 (qǐngqiú bāngzhù)
    a plea for sb to do sth 请(請)求某人做某事 (qǐngqiú mǒurén zuò mǒushì)

symmetrical

adj

  1. 对(對)称(稱)的 (duìchèn de)

underestimate

vt

  1. [importance, amount, person] 低估 (dīgū)

n (c)

  1. 低估 (dīgū)

drag

vt

  1. (= pull) [large object, body] 拖 (tuō)
  2. (= force)
    to drag sb out of a car/upstairs 把某人从(從)车(車)里(裡)拖出来(來)/拖到楼(樓)上 (bǎ mǒurén cóng chē li tuō chūlái/tuō dào lóushàng)
  3. (fig)
    it's impossible to drag him out of bed/out of the house 让(讓)他下床/离(離)开(開)房子是不可能的 (ràng tā xiàchuáng/líkāi fángzi shì bù kěnéng de)
  4. (= search) [river, lake] 打捞(撈) (dǎlāo)

vi

  1. [time, film] 拖沓 (tuōtà)

n

  1. (inf)
    a drag 累(纍)赘(贅) (léizhuì)
  2. (= women's clothing)
    in drag 男人穿着(著)女子服装(裝) (nánrén chuānzhe nǚzǐ fúzhuāng)
  3. (u) (Naut, Aviat) 阻力 (zǔlì)
    to drag your feet or heels 故意拖沓 (gùyì tuōtà)
    to drag sth out of sb 逼某人交待某事 (bī mǒurén jiāodài mǒushì)

incoming

adj

    1. [flight, call, tide] 进(進)来(來)的 (jìnlái de)
    2. [missile] 正袭(襲)来(來)的 (zhèng xílái de)
  2. [government, president] 即将(將)就任的 (jíjiāng jiùrèn de)

juvenile

adj

  1. [crime, offender, court] 青少年的 (qīngshàonián de)
  2. (pej) [humour, mentality, person] 幼稚的 (yòuzhì de)

n (c)

  1. (frm) 青少年 (qīngshàonián) (名, míng)

mineral

n (c)

  1. 矿(礦)物 (kuàngwù) (种(種), zhǒng)

cpd

  1. [deposit, resources] 矿(礦)物 (kuàngwù) (种(種), zhǒng)

sweep

n (c)

  1. the floor could do with a sweep 地板该(該)扫(掃)了 (dìbǎn gāi sǎo le)
  2. (= curve) 蜿蜒 (wānyán)
  3. (= range) 广(廣)度 (guǎngdù)

vt

  1. (with brush) 扫(掃) (sǎo)
    1. (with hand) 拂去 (fúqù)
    2. [one's hair] 掠 (lüè)
    1. [wind] 吹 (chuī)
    2. [water, crowd] 冲(沖) (chōng)
  4. [eyes, lights] [place] 扫(掃)视(視) (sǎoshì)

vi

  1. to sweep in/out/past [person] 昂首阔(闊)步地进(進)来(來)/出去/走过(過) (áng shǒu kuò bù de jìnlái/chūqù/zǒuguò)
  2. [hand, arm] 挥(揮)舞 (huīwǔ)
  3. [wind] 吹 (chuī)
    to sweep sth under the carpet or rug (fig) 隐(隱)瞒(瞞)某事 (yǐnmán mǒushì)

veil

n (c)

  1. (= covering) 面纱(紗) (miànshā)
  2. (fig) [of secrecy, silence] 掩盖(蓋) (yǎngài)

spend

vt

  1. [money] 花费(費) (huāfèi)
    ⇒ I spent a hundred pounds on clothes. 我花了100英镑买衣服。 (Wǒ huāle yībǎi yīngbàng mǎi yīfu.)
  2. [time, life] 度过(過) (dùguò)
    ⇒ I have spent all my life in this town. 我在这个镇上度过了一生。 (Wǒ zài zhège zhèn shang dùguòle yīshēng.)
    to spend time/energy on sth 在某事上花时(時)间(間)/精力 (zài mǒushì shang huā shíjiān/jīnglì)
    to spend time/energy doing sth 花时(時)间(間)/精力做某事 (huā shíjiān/jīnglì zuò mǒushì)
    to spend the night in a hotel 在旅馆(館)度过(過)一晚 (zài lǚguǎn dùguò yī wǎn)

dominate

vt

  1. [discussion, place] 在 ... 中占(佔)首要地位 (zài ... zhōng zhàn shǒuyào dìwèi)
  2. [person] 支配 (zhīpèi)

tunnel

n (c)

  1. 隧道 (suìdào) (条(條), tiáo)
  2. (in mine) 坑道 (kēngdào)

vi

  1. 挖地道 (wā dìdào)

unrest

n (u)

  1. 动(動)荡(盪) (dòngdàng)

warrant

n (c)

  1. (for arrest) 逮捕令 (dàibǔlìng) (张(張), zhāng)
  2. (also search warrant) 搜查令 (sōuchálìng) (张(張), zhāng)

vt

  1. (= merit) 应(應)受到 (yīng shòudào)

abruptly

adv

  1. (= suddenly) [leave, end] 突然地 (tūrán de)
  2. (= curtly) [speak] 生硬地 (shēngyìng de)

apprehension

n

  1. (c/u) (frm, = fear) 忧(憂)虑(慮) (yōulǜ)
  2. (u) (frm, = arrest) 逮捕 (dàibǔ)
    in or with apprehension 在恐惧(懼)中 (zài kǒngjù zhōng)

glass

n

  1. (u) (substance) 玻璃 (bōli)
  2. (c) (container) 玻璃杯 (bōlibēi) (个(個), gè)
  3. (c) (= glassful) 一杯 (yī bēi)

king

n (c)

  1. 国(國)王 (guówáng) (位, wèi)
  2. (Cards) 老K (lǎokèi) (张(張), zhāng)
  3. (Chess) 王 (wáng)
    the king of the jungle/rock 'n' roll 森林/摇(搖)滚(滾)乐(樂)之王 (sēnlín/yáogǔnyuè zhī wáng)

circulate

vi

  1. [traffic, blood] 循环(環) (xúnhuán)
  2. [news, rumour] 散播 (sànbō)
  3. [person] (at party) 交际(際) (jiāojì)

vt

  1. [report] 传(傳)阅(閱) (chuányuè)

conclusive

adj

  1. [evidence, proof] 确(確)凿(鑿)的 (quèzáo de)

criticize

vt

  1. 批评(評) (pīpíng)
    to criticize sb for (doing) sth 批评(評)某人(做)某事 (pīpíng mǒurén (zuò) mǒushì)

expel

vt

  1. [child] (from school) 把 ... 开(開)除 (bǎ ... kāichú)
  2. [person] (from place) 赶(趕)走 (gǎnzǒu)
  3. [gas, liquid] 排出 (páichū)

pioneer

n (c)

  1. [of scheme, science, method] 先驱(驅) (xiānqū) (名, míng)
  2. (= early settler) 拓荒者 (tuòhuāngzhě) (名, míng)

vt

  1. [technique, invention] 倡导(導) (chàngdǎo)

unsuitable

adj

  1. [place, time, clothes] 不适(適)宜的 (bù shìyí de)
  2. [candidate, applicant] 不合适(適)的 (bù héshì de)
  3. [friend, husband, partner] 不相称(稱)的 (bù xiāngchèn de)
    to be unsuitable for sth/for doing sth 不适(適)于(於)某事/做某事 (bù shìyú mǒushì/zuò mǒushì)
    to be unsuitable for sb 对(對)某人不合适(適) (duì mǒurén bù héshì)

withstand

vt

  1. 经(經)受住 (jīngshòu zhù)

boring

adj

  1. (= tedious) [person, job, film] 乏味的 (fáwèi de)

pt

  1. of bear

vt

  1. [hole] 钻(鑽) (zuàn)
  2. [oil well, tunnel] 开(開)凿(鑿) (kāizáo)
  3. [person] 使厌(厭)烦(煩) (shǐ yànfán)

n

  1. 12-bore shotgun 12膛径(徑)的猎(獵)枪(槍) (shí'èr tángjìng de lièqiāng)
  2. to be a bore [person] 令人讨(討)厌(厭)的人 (lìng rén tǎoyàn de rén) [situation] 令人厌(厭)烦(煩)的事 (lìng rén yànfán de shì)
    it's a bore 令人讨(討)厌(厭) (lìng rén tǎoyàn)
    it/he bores me to tears or to death or stiff 它/他把我烦(煩)死了 (tā/tā bǎ wǒ fánsǐ le)
    to be bored (with sth) (对(對)某事)不感兴(興)趣 ((duì mǒushì) bù gǎn xìngqù)
    to be bored to tears or bored to death or bored stiff (inf) 厌(厭)烦(煩)得要死 (yànfán de yào sǐ)

culminate

vi

  1. to culminate in or with sth 终(終)于(於)获(獲)得某物 (zhōngyú huòdé mǒuwù)

yearly

adj

  1. [event, meeting etc] 一年一度的 (yī nián yī dù de)
  2. [rate, income etc] 一年的 (yī nián de)

adv

  1. (= once a year) 一年一次地 (yī nián yī cì de)
  2. (= every year) 每年地 (měi nián de)
    twice yearly (as adv) 一年两(兩)次地 (yī nián liǎng cì de) (as adj) 一年两(兩)次的 (yī nián liǎng cì de)

competitor

n (c)

  1. (in business) 竞(競)争(爭)对(對)手 (jìngzhēng duìshǒu) (个(個), gè)
  2. (= participant) 参(參)赛(賽)者 (cānsàizhě) (个(個), gè)

heir

n (c)

  1. 继(繼)承人 (jìchéngrén) (位, wèi)
    to be (the) heir to sth 是某物的继(繼)承人 (shì mǒuwù de jìchéngrén)
    the heir to the throne 王位的继(繼)承人 (wángwèi de jìchéngrén)

impact

n

  1. (c/u) [of collision, blow] 冲(衝)击(擊) (chōngjī)
  2. (c) [of law, change, situation] 影响(響) (yǐngxiǎng)

penetrate

vt

  1. [light, water, sound] 透过(過) (tòuguò)
  2. [person]
    1. [territory, forest] 进(進)入 (jìnrù)
    2. [profession, organisation] 进(進)入 (jìnrù)
    3. [enemy group etc] 打入 (dǎrù)

viral

adj

  1. 热(熱)门(門)的 (rèmén de)

adj

  1. to be awake 醒着(著)的 (xǐngzhe de)

vt

  1. (liter) 唤(喚)醒 (huànxǐng)

vi

  1. (liter) 醒来(來) (xǐnglái)
    wide awake 完全清醒 (wánquán qīngxǐng)
    he lay awake all night worrying 他整晚忧(憂)心忡忡地睡不着(著)觉(覺) (tā zhěngwǎn yōuxīn chōngchōng de shuì bù zháo jiào)

broaden

vt

  1. [scope, appeal] 扩(擴)大 (kuòdà)

vi

  1. [river, smile] 变(變)宽(寬) (biànkuān)
  2. [scope, appeal] 扩(擴)大影响(響) (kuòdà yǐngxiǎng)
    to broaden the/sb's mind 拓宽(寬)思想/拓宽(寬)某人的思想 (tuòkuān sīxiǎng/tuòkuān mǒurén de sīxiǎng)

cue

n (c)

  1. (in theatre) 提示 (tíshì)
  2. (= stick) 球杆(桿) (qíugān) (根, gēn)
  3. (fig)
    a cue for sth/to do sth 某事/做某事的暗示 (mǒushì/zuò mǒushì de ànshì) (个(個), gè)
    to take one's cue from sb (fig) 以某人为(為)榜样(樣) (yǐ mǒurén wéi bǎngyàng)
    on cue (= at the expected time) 就在这(這)时(時) (jiù zài zhèshí)

  1. 神话(話) (shénhuà) (个(個), gè)

vt

  1. 量化 (liànghuà)

  1. (= compromise) 让(讓)步 (ràngbù)
  2. (= right) 特许(許)权(權) (tèxǔquán)
  3. (Brit, = reduced price) 减(減)价(價) (jiǎnjià)
    美 = reduction

decidedly

adv

  1. 明显(顯)地 (míngxiǎn de)

adj

  2. [drinker, criminal, liar] 积(積)习(習)已深的 (jīxí yǐshēn de)

num

  1. 第十三 (dìshísān)

  2. (Aut) 加速 (jiāsù)

vt

n (c)

  1. 口译(譯)者 (kǒuyìzhě) (位, wèi)

lag

vt

  1. [pipes etc] 给(給) ... 加上外套 (gěi ... jiāshang wàitào)

liberate

vt

  2. [oppressed people etc] 使获(獲)自由 (shǐ huò zìyóu)
  3. [hostage, prisoner] 释(釋)放 (shìfàng)

pessimistic

adj

  1. [person, attitude] 悲观(觀)的 (bēiguān de)
    to be pessimistic about sth 对(對)某事感到悲观(觀) (duì mǒushì gǎndào bēiguān)

photographic

adj

  1. [equipment, paper, evidence] 摄(攝)影的 (shèyǐng de)

viewer

n (c)

  1. [of TV] 观(觀)众(眾) (guānzhòng)

chamber

n (c)

    1. (= meeting room) 会(會)议(議)室 (huìyìshì) (间(間), jiān)
    2. (= room for particular purpose) 房间(間) (fángjiān) (间(間), jiān)
  2. (Pol, = section of parliament) 议(議)院 (yìyuàn)

enjoyable

adj

  1. 有乐(樂)趣的 (yǒu lèqù de)

rebel

n (c)

  1. (against society, parents) 反叛者 (fǎnpànzhě)
  2. (in uprising) 起义(義)者 (qǐyìzhě)
  3. (in politics) 持不同政见(見)者 (chí bùtóng zhèngjiànzhě)

vi

  1. (against society, parents) 反叛 (fǎnpàn)
  2. (in uprising) 起义(義) (qǐyì)
  3. (in politics) 反对(對) (fǎnduì)

signal

n (c)

  1. (to do sth) 信号(號) (xìnhào) (个(個), gè)
  2. (= indication) 暗示 (ànshì)
  3. (Rail) 信号(號)机(機) (xìnhàojī) (部, bù)
  4. (Elec) 信号(號) (xìnhào) (个(個), gè)

vi

  1. (with gesture, sound)
    to signal (to sb) (向某人)示意 ((xiàng mǒurén) shìyì)
  2. (Aut, with indicator) 开(開)信号(號)灯(燈)示意 (kāi xìnhàodēng shìyì)

vt

    1. [message] 用信号(號)示意 (yòng xìnhào shìyì)
    2. [person] 向 ... 打手势(勢)示意 (xiàng ... dǎ shǒushì shìyì)
  2. (= indicate) 标(標)志(誌)着(著) (biāozhìzhe)

adj

  1. (frm) [triumph, failure] 显(顯)著的 (xiǎnzhù de)

absorbing

adj

  1. [book, film etc] 引人入胜(勝)的 (yǐn rén rù shèng de)

vt

  1. [liquid, light] 吸收 (xīshōu)
  2. [shock, impact, sound] 消减(減) (xiāojiǎn)
  3. (= assimilate) [group, business] 并(並)入 (bìngrù)
    1. (= cope with) [effects, losses] 承受 (chéngshòu)
    2. [information, facts] 理解 (lǐjiě)
      to be absorbed in a book 专(專)心致志地读(讀)一本书(書) (zhuān xīn zhì zhì de dú yī běn shū)

futile

adj

  1. [attempt, gesture, search] 无(無)效的 (wúxiào de)

halfway

adv

  1. (between two points) 到一半 (dào yībàn)
    to meet sb halfway (fig) 和某人折中妥协(協) (hé mǒurén zhézhōng tuǒxié)
    halfway through sth 在某事过(過)了一半时(時) (zài mǒushì guòle yībàn shí)
    the halfway point or stage of a race 比赛(賽)中点(點)时(時) (bǐsài zhōngdiǎn shí)

invent

vt

  1. [machine, system, game, word] 发(發)明 (fāmíng)
  2. [lie, excuse] 捏造 (niēzào)

laboratory

n (c)

  1. (= for analysis, research) 研究室 (yánjiūshì) (个(個), gè)
  2. (in school) 实(實)验(驗)室 (shíyànshì) (个(個), gè)

lethal

adj

  1. [weapon, chemical etc] 致命的 (zhìmìng de)

navigation

n (u)

  1. (= action) 航行 (hángxíng)
  2. (= science) 航行学(學) (hángxíngxué)

activate

vt

  1. [mechanism] 使活动(動) (shǐ húodòng)

antibody

n (c)

  1. 抗体(體) (kàngtǐ)

aspire

vi

  1. to aspire to 有志于(於) (yǒuzhì yú)

gland

n (c)

  1. 腺体(體) (xiàntǐ) (个(個), gè)

inhibited

adj

  1. 拘束的 (jūshù de)

vt

  1. (= slow down, stop) 阻止 (zǔzhǐ)
  2. to inhibit sb from doing sth (= discourage) 阻止某人做某事 (zǔzhǐ mǒurén zuò mǒushì)

outweigh

vt

  1. the advantages (far) outweigh the disadvantages 利(远(遠)远(遠))大于(於)弊 (lì (yuǎnyuǎn) dàyú bì)

presume

vt

  1. (= assume)
    to presume (that ... ) 认(認)定( ... ) (rèndìng ( ... ))
  2. (= dare)
    to presume to do sth 擅自做某事 (shànzì zuò mǒushì)
    I presume so 我认(認)为(為)是的 (wǒ rènwéi shì de)
    to be presumed dead 被认(認)定死亡 (bèi rèndìng sǐwáng)

sterile

adj

  1. [bandage, needle] 消过(過)毒的 (xiāoguodú de)
  2. [person, animal] 不育的 (bùyù de)
  3. [debate, ideas] 枯燥乏味的 (kūzào fáwèi de)

announce

vt

  1. (= declare) [decision, engagement etc] 宣布(佈) (xuānbù)
    ⇒ The TV presenter announced the grave news. 电视解说员宣布了这条重大消息。 (Diànshì jiěshuōyuán xuānbùle zhè tiáo zhòngdà xiāoxi.)
  2. (at station or airport) 通告 (tōnggào)

vi

  1. (= say) 说(說) (shuō)
    ⇒ "I'm going to bed," she announced. "我要睡觉了," 她说道。 ("Wǒ yào shuìjiào le, " tā shuōdào.)
    to announce that ... (in official statement, in a clear way) 宣布(佈) ... (xuānbù ... ) (at airport or station) 通告 (tōnggào)
    the government has announced that ... 政府宣称(稱) ... (zhèngfǔ xuānchēng ... )

sometime

adv

  1. 某个(個)时(時)候 (mǒugè shíhòu)

leaning

n (c)

  1. 倾(傾)向 (qīngxiàng)

vt

  1. to lean sth on/against sth 把某物靠在某物上 (bǎ mǒuwù kào zài mǒuwù shang)

vi

  1. (= slope) 倾(傾)斜 (qīngxié)

adj

  1. [person] 精瘦的 (jīngshòu de)
  2. [meat] 瘦的 (shòu de)
  3. [period of time] 不景气(氣)的 (bù jǐngqì de)
    to lean against sth [person] 靠在某物上 (kào zài mǒuwù shang)
    to lean forward/back 向前/后(後)倾(傾) (xiàng qián/hòu qīng)

receiver

n (c)

  1. (of telephone) 听(聽)筒 (tīngtǒng) (个(個), gè)
  2. (Rad, TV) 接收器 (jiēshōuqì)
  3. (Comm) 破产(產)管理人 (pòchǎn guǎnlǐrén)

talented

adj

  1. [person, actor etc] 有才能的 (yǒu cáinéng de)

applicant

n (c)

  1. (for job, place at college) 申请(請)人 (shēnqǐngrén) (个(個), gè)

assemble

vt

  1. (= gather together) [people, group] 集合 (jíhé)
  2. (= fit together) [machinery, object] 装(裝)配 (zhuāngpèi)

vi

  1. (= gather) [people, crowd] 聚集 (jùjí)

dissolve

vt

  1. (in liquid) 溶解 (róngjiě)
  2. to be dissolved [organization, marriage] 终(終)结(結) (zhōngjié) [parliament] 被解散 (bèi jiěsàn)

vi

  1. [material] 溶解 (róngjiě)
    to dissolve in(to) tears/laughter 情不自禁地流泪(淚)/大笑起来(來) (qíng bù zì jīn de liúlèi/dàxiào qǐlái)

envelope

n (c)

  1. 信封 (xìnfēng) (个(個), gè)

faculty

n

  1. (c) (= sense, ability) 官能 (guānnéng) (种(種), zhǒng)
  2. (c/u) (Brit) [of university] 学(學)院 (xuéyuàn) (个(個), gè)
  3. (c/u) (US, = teaching staff) 全体(體)教师(師) (quántǐ jiàoshī)

highway

n (c)

  1. 公路 (gōnglù) (条(條), tiáo)

pleasing

adj

  1. [situation, picture, person] 令人愉快的 (lìng rén yúkuài de)
    it's pleasing to see/know that ... 高兴(興)地看到/知道 ... (gāoxìng de kàndào/zhīdào ... )

int

  1. (in polite requests, written instructions) 请(請) (qǐng)
  2. (accepting sth) 好的 (hǎo de)
  3. (to attract attention) 劳(勞)驾(駕) (láojià)

vt

  1. (= satisfy) 使高兴(興) (shǐ gāoxìng)

vi

  1. (= give pleasure, satisfaction) 满(滿)意 (mǎnyì)
    yes, please 好的 (hǎode)
    my bill, please 请(請)给(給)我账(賬)单(單) (qǐng gěi wǒ zhàngdān)
    please don't cry! 拜托(託)，别(別)哭了！ (bàituō, bié kū le!)
    it pleased them to ... ... 让(讓)他们(們)开(開)心 ( ... ràng tāmen kāixīn)
    please yourself! (inf) 请(請)便！ (qǐngbiàn!)
    do as you please 按你喜欢(歡)的做 (àn nǐ xǐhuan de zuò)

specimen

n (c)

  1. [of plant, animal] 标(標)本 (biāoběn)
  2. [of handwriting, signature] 实(實)例 (shílì)
  3. [of blood, urine] 抽样(樣) (chōuyàng)

stationary

adj

  1. 停滞(滯)的 (tíngzhì de)

suite

n (c)

  1. (in hotel, large building) 套间(間) (tàojiān) see also en suite
  2. (= furniture) 一套家具 (yī tào jiājù)
    a bedroom/dining room suite 一套卧(臥)室/饭(飯)厅(廳)家具 (yī tào wòshì/fàntīng jiājù)
    a bathroom suite 一套卫浴设备 (yī tào wèiyù shèbèi)

ancestral

adj

  1. 祖传(傳)的 (zǔchuán de)

eighty

num

  1. 八十 (bāshí)

flooding

n (u)

  1. 泛(氾)滥(濫) (fànlàn)

n

  1. (c/u) [of water] 洪水 (hóngshuǐ) (次, cì)
  2. (c) [of letters, requests, imports] 大量 (dàliàng)

vt

  1. (through forces of nature) 淹没(沒) (yānmò)
  2. (intentionally) 浇(澆)灌 (jiāoguàn)
  3. (Aut) [engine] 使 ... 溢流 (shǐ ... yìliú)

vi

  1. [place] 为(為)水所淹 (wéi shuǐ suǒ yān)
  2. [people, goods]
    to flood into 洪水般涌(湧)入 (hóngshuǐ bān yǒngrù)
    to flood the market (Comm) 充斥市场(場) (chōngchì shìchǎng)
    in flood 泛(氾)滥(濫) (fànlàn)

forge

vt

  1. (fraudulently) [signature, banknote] 伪(偽)造 (wěizào)
  2. (= create) [alliance, relationship, links] 创(創)建 (chuàngjiàn)
  3. [wrought iron] 锻(鍛)造 (duànzào)

n (c)

  1. (= smithy) 铁(鐵)匠铺(鋪) (tiějiàngpù) (个(個), gè)

plainly

adv

  1. (= obviously) 显(顯)然地 (xiǎnrán de)
  2. (= distinctly)
    1. [hear, see, recognize] 清楚地 (qīngchǔ de)
    2. [state] 明确(確)地 (míngquè de)

accomplishment

n

  1. (c) (= achievement) 成就 (chéngjiù)
  2. (c) (frm, = skill) 技能 (jìnéng) (项, xiàng)
  3. (u) (= completion) 完成 (wánchéng)

exploit

n

  1. (= deed, feat) 英勇业(業)绩(績) (yīngyǒng yèjì)

vt

  1. (= make use of)
    1. [opportunity, talent] 利用 (lìyòng)
    2. [resources] 开(開)发(發) (kāifā)
    3. (unfairly) [person, idea] 剥(剝)削 (bōxuē)

illuminated

adj

  1. [sign, building] 被照明的 (bèi zhàomíng de)
  2. [manuscript] 加了彩饰(飾)的 (jiāle cǎishì de)

vt

  1. [room, street, building] 照明 (zhàomíng)
  2. (= explain) 解释(釋) (jiěshì)

league

n (c)

  1. (= like-minded group) 联(聯)盟 (liánméng)
  2. (Sport) 联(聯)赛(賽) (liánsài) (季, jì)
    to be in league with sb 与(與)某人勾结(結) (yǔ mǒurén gōujié)
    to be in the same league as sb (comparing) 与(與)某人同类(類) (yǔ mǒurén tónglèi)
    out of sb's league (fig) 与(與)某人不是一类(類)人 (yǔ mǒurén bù shì yī lèi rén)

prophet

n (c)

  1. (Rel) 先知 (xiānzhī) (位, wèi)
    prophet of doom 悲观(觀)预(預)言家 (bēiguān yùyánjiā)

economist

n (c)

  1. 经(經)济(濟)学(學)家 (jīngjì xuéjiā) (位, wèi)

incidentally

adv

  1. (= by the way) 顺(順)便提一句 (shùnbiàn tí yī jù)

nail

n (c)

  1. [of finger, toe] 指甲 (zhǐjia) (个(個), gè)
  2. (for hammering) 钉(釘)子 (dīngzi) (枚, méi)

vt

  1. (= attach)
    to nail sth to/on sth 把某物钉(釘)在某物上 (bǎ mǒuwù dìng zài mǒuwù shang)
  2. (inf) [thief] 抓住 (zhuāzhù)
    to be nailed shut 用钉(釘)子钉(釘)死 (yòng dīngzi dìngsǐ)

nobility

n

  1. (u) (= quality) 高尚 (gāoshàng)
  2. the nobility 贵(貴)族 (guìzú)

sail

n (c)

  1. [of boat, yacht] 帆 (fān) (张(張), zhāng)

vt

  1. [boat, yacht] 驾(駕)驶(駛) (jiàshǐ)

vi

  1. (= travel)
    1. [ship] 航行 (hángxíng)
    2. [sailor] 扬(揚)帆行驶(駛) (yángfān xíngshǐ)
    3. [passenger] 乘船航行 (chéngchuán hángxíng)
  2. (= begin voyage) 起航 (qǐháng)
  3. (= fly)
    to sail over/across/up to sth 飞(飛)过(過)/飞(飛)越/上升到某处(處) (fēiguò/fēiyuè/shàngshēng dào mǒuchù)
    to set sail 起航 (qǐháng)
    to sail for or to set sail for 起航前往 (qǐháng qiánwǎng)
    to go sailing 去航行 (qù hángxíng)

coarse

adj

  1. [cloth, salt, sand] 粗的 (cū de)
  2. (= vulgar) [person, remark] 粗俗的 (cūsú de)

opaque

adj

  1. [substance, glass, window] 不透明的 (bù tòumíng de)
  2. [comment, language] 晦涩(澀)的 (huìsè de)

distort

vt

  1. [statement, fact, idea] 歪曲 (wāiqū)
  2. [sound, shape, image] 使失真 (shǐ shīzhēn)

foreground

n (c/u)

  1. [of painting] 前景 (qiánjǐng)
    to be in/come to the foreground (fig) 处(處)于(於)/取得突出地位 (chǔyú/qǔdé tūchū dìwèi)

steer

vt

  1. [car, boat, plane] 驾(駕)驶(駛) (jiàshǐ)
  2. to steer sb to/towards 带(帶)领(領)某人去/向 ... 方向发(發)展 (dàilǐng mǒurén qù/xiàng ... fāngxiàng fāzhǎn)

vi

  1. [car, boat, plane] 行驶(駛) (xíngshǐ)
    to steer clear of sb/sth 避开(開)某人/某事 (bìkāi mǒurén/mǒushì)

sunlight

n (u)

  1. 阳(陽)光 (yángguāng)

coloured

adj

  1. [illustration etc] 有色的 (yǒusè de)
  2. (o.f.) [person] 有色的 (yǒusè de)
    brightly coloured 色泽(澤)鲜(鮮)艳(豔) (sèzé xiānyàn)

n

  1. (c) 颜(顏)色 (yánsè) (种(種), zhǒng)
  2. (c) (= skin colour) 肤(膚)色 (fūsè) (种(種), zhǒng)
    ⇒ South Africans of all colours 各种肤色的南非人 (gèzhǒng fūsè de nánfēirén)
  3. (u) (= interest) 生动(動) (shēngdòng)

vt

  1. (with paint, crayons, dye) 给(給) ... 着(著)色 (gěi ... zhuósè)
    ⇒ Does she colour her hair? 她染头发吗？ (Tā rǎn tóufa ma?)
  2. (= affect) [judgement, account] 影响(響) (yǐngxiǎng)

vi

  1. (= blush) 脸(臉)红(紅) (liǎnhóng)

cpd

  1. [film, photograph, television] 彩色 (cǎisè)
    in colour [film, illustrations] 彩色 (cǎisè)

fidelity

n (u)

(frm)
  1. [of spouse, dog] 忠诚(誠) (zhōngchéng)
  2. (= accuracy) [of report, translation] 精确(確) (jīngquè)

gospel

n

  1. (c) (Rel) 福音书(書) (fúyīnshū)
  2. (c) (= doctrine) 信条(條) (xìntiáo)
  3. (u) (also gospel music) 福音音乐(樂) (fúyīn yīnyuè)
  4. (u) (also gospel truth) 绝(絕)对(對)真理 (juéduì zhēnlǐ)
    the gospel (= Christ's teachings) 福音书(書) (fúyīnshū)

retrospect

n

  1. in retrospect 回顾(顧) (huígù)

dig

vt

  1. [hole] 挖 (wā)
  2. [garden] 掘土 (juétǔ)
  3. to dig sth into sth (= sink) 将(將)某物伸进(進)某物 (jiāng mǒuwù shēnjìn mǒuwù)

vi

  1. (with spade) 挖掘 (wājué)
  2. to dig into sth (= sink) 戳进(進) (chuōjìn)

n

  1. (= prod)
    to give sb a dig in the ribs 戳了某人肋部一下 (chuōle mǒurén lèibù yīxià)
  2. (c) (= excavation) (also archaeological dig)
    1. 考古挖掘 (kǎogǔ wājué) (次, cì)
  3. (inf)
    to have/take a dig at sb (= criticism) 挖苦某人 (wākǔ mǒurén)

concede

vt

  1. (= admit) 承认(認) (chéngrèn)

vi

  1. 让(讓)步 (ràngbù)
    to concede that ... 承认(認) ... (chéngrèn ... )

disapproval

n (u)

  1. 不赞(贊)成 (bù zànchéng)

misguided

adj

  1. [opinion, attempt] 误(誤)导(導)的 (wùdǎo de)
  2. [person] 误(誤)入歧途的 (wùrù qítú de)

repress

vt

  1. [people, revolt] 压(壓)制 (yāzhì)
  2. [feeling, impulse] 压(壓)抑 (yāyì)

cancel

vt

  1. [meeting, visit, reservation, flight] 取消 (qǔxiāo)
  2. [contract, order] 撤销(銷) (chèxiāo)
  3. [document] 废(廢)除 (fèichú)
  4. [debt] 注(註)销(銷) (zhùxiāo)
  5. [cheque, stamp etc] 盖(蓋)销(銷) (gàixiāo)

compose

vt

  1. to be composed of 由 ... 组(組)成 (yóu ... zǔchéng)
  2. (= write)
    1. [music] 创(創)作 (chuàngzuò)
    2. (frm) [poem, letter] 写(寫) (xiě)
      to compose o.s. 使自己镇(鎮)定下来(來) (shǐ zìjǐ zhèndìng xiàlái)

double

adj

  1. [doors, tracks] 双(雙)的 (shuāng de)
  2. [murder, wedding] 成双(雙)的 (chéngshuāng de)
  3. [helping, share, whisky, garage] 双(雙)份的 (shuāngfèn de)
  4. (= for two) [room, sheet] 双(雙)人的 (shuāngrén de)

n

  1. to be sb's double 酷似某人 (kùsì mǒurén)
  2. (c) (= drink) 双(雙)份 (shuāngfèn)

vt

  1. [offer, size] 使 ... 增至两(兩)倍 (shǐ ... zēng zhì liǎng bèi)

vi

  1. [population, size] 变(變)成两(兩)倍 (biànchéng liǎng bèi)
    double five two six (Brit, = 5526) 五五二六 (wǔ wǔ èr liù)
    it's spelt with a double "M" 它的拼写(寫)中有两(兩)个(個)"M" (tā de pīnxiě zhōng yǒu liǎng gè "M")
    double the size/number (of sth) (是某物)大小/数(數)量的两(兩)倍 ((shì mǒuwù) dàxiǎo/shùliàng de liǎng bèi)
    double in size/weight 两(兩)倍大/重 (liǎng bèi dà/zhòng)
    to double as sth 兼做某事 (jiān zuò mǒushì)
    at or on the double (inf, = immediately) 迅速地 (xùnsù de)

prohibit

vt

  1. 禁止 (jìnzhǐ)
    to prohibit sb from doing sth 严(嚴)禁某人做某事 (yánjìn mǒurén zuò mǒushì)
    "smoking prohibited" "严(嚴)禁吸烟(煙)" ("yánjìn xīyān")

startling

adj

  1. 惊(驚)人的 (jīngrén de)

vt

  1. 使吓(嚇)一跳 (shǐ xià yī tiào)

swim

vi

  1. [person, animal] 游水 (yóushuǐ)
  2. (as sport) 游泳 (yóuyǒng)
  3. (fig) [room] 旋转(轉) (xuánzhuǎn)

vt

  1. [river etc] 游过(過) (yóuguò)
  2. [distance] 游 (yóu)

chorus

n (c)

  1. (= refrain) 齐(齊)唱 (qíchàng)
  2. (= song) 合唱曲 (héchàngqǔ) (首, shǒu)
  3. (= choir, not soloists) 合唱队(隊) (héchàngduì) (支, zhī)
  4. [of complaints, criticism] 异(異)口同声(聲) (yì kǒu tóng shēng)

vt

  1. 异(異)口同声(聲)地说(說) (yì kǒu tóng shēng de shuō)
    in chorus 一齐(齊) (yīqí)

exceedingly

adv

  1. 极其 (jíqí)

precede

vt

  1. (in time) [event] 早于(於) (zǎoyú)
  2. (in space) [person] 先于(於) (xiānyú)
  3. [words, sentences, section] 在 ... 之前 (zài ... zhīqián)

whichever

adj

  1. (= any ... that) 无(無)论(論)哪个(個) (wúlùn nǎge)

pron

  1. (= no matter which) 无(無)论(論)哪个(個) (wúlùn nǎge)
  2. (specifying) ... 的那一个(個) ( ... de nà yī gè)
    whichever way you look at it 无(無)论(論)你以何种(種)方式看待它 (wúlùn nǐ yǐ hé zhǒng fāngshì kàndài tā)

admire

vt

  1. (= like, respect) [person] 钦(欽)佩 (qīnpèi)
  2. (= look at) [something beautiful] 欣赏(賞) (xīnshǎng)
    I admire your courage/honesty 我钦(欽)佩你的勇气(氣)/诚(誠)实(實) (wǒ qīnpèi nǐ de yǒngqì/chéngshí)

sang

pt

  1. of sing

vi

  1. [person] 唱歌 (chànggē)
  2. [bird] 鸣(鳴) (míng)

vt

  1. [song]
    1. [person] 唱 (chàng)
    2. [bird] 鸣(鳴)唱 (míngchàng)
      to sing sb sth, sing sth to sb 为(為)某人唱某歌 (wèi mǒurén chàng mǒugē)

supporter

n (c)

  1. [of politician, policy] 支持者 (zhīchízhě) (名, míng)
  2. [of team] 追随(隨)者 (zhuīsuízhě)

textile

n (c)

  1. 纺(紡)织(織)品 (fǎngzhīpǐn) (件, jiàn)

counteract

vt

  1. [effect, tendency] 对(對)抗 (duìkàng)

layer

n (c)

  1. [of substance, material] 层(層) (céng)
  2. (fig) [of system, idea] 层(層) (céng)

vt

  1. 把 ... 分层(層) (bǎ ... fēncéng)

silly

adj

  1. [person] 愚蠢的 (yúchǔn de)
  2. [idea, object] 可笑的 (kěxiào de)
    he's silly to be upset 他这(這)么(麼)难(難)过(過)真是太傻了 (tā zhème nánguò zhēnshi tài shǎ le)
    it would be silly to waste it 把它浪费(費)了就太愚蠢了 (bǎ tā làngfèile jiù tài yúchǔn le)

unmarried

adj

  1. 未婚的 (wèihūn de)

acre

n (c)

  1. 英亩(畝) (yīngmǔ)

autobiography

n (c)

  1. 自传(傳) (zìzhuàn) (部, bù)

discontent

n (c)

  1. 不满(滿)意 (bù mǎnyì)

greed

n (u)

  1. 贪(貪)婪 (tānlán)
    greed for sth 对(對)某物贪(貪)得无(無)厌(厭) (duì mǒuwù tān dé wú yàn)

singer

n (c)

  1. 歌手 (gēshǒu) (位, wèi)

stereotype

n (c)

  1. 老套 (lǎotào)

vt

  1. 使模式化 (shǐ móshìhuà)

twist

n (c)

  1. (= action) 拧(擰) (nǐng)
  2. (in road, track etc) 弯(彎)曲处(處) (wānqūchù) (个(個), gè)
  3. (in coil, flex etc) 螺旋状(狀) (luóxuánzhuàng)
  4. (in story) 转(轉)变(變) (zhuǎnbiàn)

vt

  1. (= turn) 扭 (niǔ)
  2. (turn the ends of) 使成螺旋状(狀) (shǐ chéng luóxuánzhuàng)
  3. (= injure) [ankle] 扭伤(傷) (niǔshāng)
  4. [sb's arm, hand etc] 扭 (niǔ)
  5. (= turn) [object] 转(轉)动 (zhuàndòng)
  6. (fig) [meaning, words] 曲解 (qūjiě)

vi

  1. [road, river] 盘(盤)旋 (pánxuán)
  2. [arm, leg etc] 扭曲 (niǔqū)

vanish

vi

  1. [person, aircraft] 消失 (xiāoshī)
  2. (= cease to exist) [tradition, system, species] 灭(滅)绝(絕) (mièjué)

dispose

vt fus

  1. to dispose of (= get rid of)
    1. [body, unwanted goods] 把 ... 处(處)理掉 (bǎ ... chǔlǐ diào)
    (= deal with) [problem, task] 处(處)理 (chùlǐ) (frm, = kill) 干(幹)掉 (gàndiào)

mate

n (c)

  1. (Brit, inf, = friend) 伙(夥)伴 (huǒbàn) (位, wèi)
  2. (= animal) 配偶 (pèi'ǒu) (个(個), gè)
  3. (Naut) (also first mate) 大副 (dàfù) (位, wèi)
    1. (Mil, = junior officer) 军(軍)士 (jūnshì) (位, wèi)
  4. (= assistant) 助手 (zhùshǒu) (位, wèi)

vi

  1. [animals] 交配 (jiāopèi)

overthrow

vt

  1. [government, leader] 推翻 (tuīfān)

n (s)

  1. 推翻 (tuīfān)

retrieve

vt

  1. [object] 取回 (qǔhuí)
  2. (= put right) [situation, error] 挽回 (wǎnhuí)
  3. (Comput) 检索 (jiǎnsuǒ)

automobile

n (c)

  1. 汽车(車) (qìchē) (辆(輛), liàng)

awe

n (u)

  1. (= respect) 敬畏 (jìngwèi)

commentary

n

  1. (c/u) (on match, proceedings) 实(實)况(況)报(報)道 (shíkuàng bàodào) (段, duàn)
  2. (c) (= book, article) 集注 (jízhù)

necessity

n

  1. (u) (= need) 需要 (xūyào)
  2. (c) (= essential item) 必需品 (bìxūpǐn) (个(個), gè)
  3. (c) (= essential measure) 不可避免的事情 (bù kě bìmiǎn de shìqing) (件, jiàn)
    there is no necessity for us to do anything 我们(們)没(沒)有必要做什么(麼) (wǒmen méiyǒu bìyào zuò shénme)
    of necessity (frm) 必定 (bìdìng)
    out of necessity 迫不得已 (pò bù dé yǐ)
    the necessity of doing sth 做某事的必要性 (zuò mǒushì de bìyàoxìng)

antagonism

n (u)

  1. 敌(敵)对(對) (díduì)

await

vt

  1. (= wait for) 等待 (děngdài)
  2. (= be in store for) 等待着(著) (děngdài zhe)
    long awaited [event, opportunity] 期待已久的 (qīdài yǐ jiǔ de)

economical

adj

  1. [system, car, machine] 节(節)约(約)的 (jiéyuē de)
  2. [person] 节(節)省的 (jiéshěng de)

literate

adj

  1. (= able to read and write) 有读(讀)写(寫)能力的 (yǒu dúxiě nénglì de)
  2. (= well-educated) 有文化修养(養)的 (yǒu wénhuà xiūyǎng de)

moisture

n (u)

  1. 水分 (shuǐfèn)

navigate

vt

  1. [ship, aircraft] 导(導)航 (dǎoháng)
  2. [river, ocean] 在 ... 航行 (zài ... hángxíng)

vi

  1. (in a car) 指路 (zhǐlù)
  2. [birds, fish] 找到正确(確)的方向 (zhǎodào zhèngquè de fāngxiàng)
    to navigate (one's way) around sth (lit) 绕(繞)过(過)某物 (ràoguo mǒuwù)
    to navigate (a path) through sth (fig) 找到解决(決)的方法 (zhǎodào jiějué de fāngfǎ)

sculpture

n

  1. (u) (= art) 雕塑 (diāosù)
  2. (c) (= object) 塑像 (sùxiàng) (座, zuò)

composer

n (c)

  1. 作曲家 (zuòqǔjiā) (位, wèi)

electronics

n (u)

  1. (= technology) 电(電)子学(學) (diànzǐxué)

n pl

  1. [of machine] 电(電)子仪(儀)器 (diànzǐ yíqì)

fatty

adj

  1. [food] 含脂肪多的 (hán zhīfáng duō de)
  2. [acids, tissue] 脂肪的 (zhīfáng de)

n (c)

  1. (inf, = man, woman) 胖子 (pàngzi) (个(個), gè)

hopeful

adj

  1. (= optimistic) [person] 乐(樂)观(觀)的 (lèguān de)
  2. (= promising) [situation, sign] 鼓舞人心的 (gǔwǔ rénxīn de)

n (c)

  1. 有前途的人 (yǒu qiántú de rén) (个(個), gè)
    to be hopeful that ... 对(對) ... 抱有希望 (duì ... bào yǒu xīwàng)
    surgeons are hopeful of saving her 外科医(醫)生对(對)挽救她抱有希望 (wàikē yīshēng duì wǎnjiù tā bàoyǒu xīwàng)

stabilize

vt

  1. [prices, rates] 保持 ... 的稳(穩)定 (bǎochí ... de wěndìng)

vi

  1. [prices, rates, patient's condition] 稳(穩)定 (wěndìng)

zeal

n (u)

  1. 热(熱)情 (rèqíng)

cholesterol

n (u)

  1. 胆(膽)固醇 (dǎngùchún)

compulsion

n

  1. (c) (= desire, impulse) 强(強)烈的欲(慾)望 (qiángliè de yùwàng) (种(種), zhǒng)
  2. (u) (= pressure) 强(強)制 (qiángzhì)

Hawaii

n

  1. 夏威夷 (Xiàwēiyí)

improper

adj

  1. (= unsuitable) [procedure] 不适(適)当(當)的 (bù shìdàng de)
  2. (= dishonest) [activities] 不正当(當)的 (bù zhèngdàng de)
  3. (o.f., = rude) 不合适(適)的 (bù héshì de)
    It would be improper to ... ... 是不适(適)当(當)的 ( ... shì bù shìdàng de)

commentator

n (c)

  1. (describing match, proceedings) 解说(說)员(員) (jiěshuōyuán) (位, wèi)
  2. (= expert) 评(評)论(論)者 (pínglùnzhě)

killer

n (c)

  1. (= murderer) 凶手 (xiōngshǒu) (个(個), gè)
  2. (= disease, activity) 杀(殺)灭(滅)物 (shāmièwù) (种(種), zhǒng)
    learning English vocabulary is a killer 学(學)习(習)英文单(單)词(詞)真是难(難)死人了 (xuéxí yīngwén dāncí zhēn shì nán sǐ rén le)

meter

n (c)

  1. (= instrument) (for gas, water, electricity) 仪(儀)表 (yíbiǎo) (个(個), gè)
  2. (also parking meter) 停车(車)计(計)时(時)器 (tíngchē jìshíqì) (个(個), gè)
  3. (US, = unit) = metre

vt

  1. [gas, water, electricity] 用表计(計)量 (yòng biǎo jìliáng)

n (c)

  1. (= unit) 米 (mǐ)

orbit

n (c)

  1. [of planet, satellite etc] 轨(軌)道 (guǐdào) (条(條), tiáo)

vt

  1. [earth, moon etc] 环(環)绕(繞) ... 运(運)行 (huánrào ... yùnxíng)
    to put a satellite into orbit 将(將)卫(衛)星送入轨(軌)道 (jiāng wèixīng sòngrù guǐdào)

outdated

adj

  1. [custom, idea, method] 过(過)时(時)的 (guòshí de)

spin

n

  1. (c/u) [of wheel etc] 旋转(轉) (xuánzhuǎn)
  2. (s) (= in car) 兜风(風) (dōufēng)
  3. (s) (Aviat) 急剧(劇)下降 (jíjù xiàjiàng)
  4. (s) (= interpretation) 添油加醋 (tiān yóu jiā cù)
  5. (u) (pej, Pol) 添油加醋 (tiānyóujiācù)
  6. (c/u) [of ball] 旋转(轉) (xuánzhuǎn)

vt

  1. [wheel, ball, coin] 使 ... 旋转(轉) (shǐ ... xuánzhuǎn)
  2. [wool, cotton] 纺(紡) (fǎng)
  3. (Brit) (also spin-dry) 甩干(乾) (shuǎigān)

vi

  1. [person] 转(轉)身 (zhuǎnshēn)
  2. [wheel, ball etc] 打转(轉) (dǎzhuàn)
  3. (= make thread) 纺(紡)纱(紗) (fǎngshā)
    my head's spinning 我头(頭)昏脑(腦)胀 (wǒ tóu hūn nǎo zhàng)
    to spin a yarn 编(編)造奇闻(聞)轶(軼)事 (biānzào qíwén yìshì)

balloon

n (c)

  1. (child's) 气(氣)球 (qìqiú) (只, zhī)
  2. (also hot-air balloon) 热(熱)气(氣)球 (rèqìqiú) (个(個), gè)

vi

  1. (= increase in size) 膨胀(脹) (péngzhàng)

exhaust

n

(esp Brit)
  1. (c) (also exhaust pipe) 排气(氣)管 (páiqìguǎn) (根, gēn)
  2. (u) (= fumes) 废(廢)气(氣) (fèiqì)

vt

  1. [person] 使精疲力竭 (shǐ jīng pí lì jié)
  2. [money, resources etc] 耗尽(盡) (hàojìn)
  3. [topic] 详(詳)尽(盡)无(無)遗(遺)地论(論)述 (xiángjìn wú yí de lùnshù)
    to exhaust o.s. 精疲力竭 (jīng pí lì jié)

eye

n

  1. (c) (Anat) 眼睛 (yǎnjing) (只, zhī)
  2. (c) (fig) 眼光 (yǎnguāng)
    ⇒ He scrutinised the pages with a critical eye. 他以挑剔的眼光细看了几页。 (Tā yǐ tiāotī de yǎnguāng xì kàn le jǐ yè.)
  3. (c) [of needle] 孔 (kǒng)
  4. (s) [of tornado, hurricane] 风(風)眼 (fēngyǎn)

vt

  1. (= look at) 审(審)视(視) (shěnshì)
    ⇒ We eyed each other thoughtfully. 我们仔细地审视了对方。 (Wǒmen zǐxì de shěnshìle duìfāng.)
    to keep an eye on sb/sth 密切注意某人/某事 (mìqiè zhùyì mǒurén/mǒushì)
    before or in front of or under one's eyes 在某人的眼皮底下 (zài mǒurén de yǎnpí dǐxià)
    to catch sb's eye [action, movement] 被某人看到 (bèi mǒurén kàndào) [person] (deliberately) 引起某人的注意 (yǐnqǐ mǒurén de zhùyì)
    to clap or lay or set eyes on sb/sth (inf) 看见(見)某人/某事 (kànjiàn mǒurén/mǒushì)
    to have one's eye on sth (inf, = want) 想要某物 (xiǎngyào mǒuwù)
    to keep one's eyes open for or to keep an eye out for sb/sth 留意某人/某事 (liúyì mǒurén/mǒushì)
    to look sb in the eye or to meet sb's eyes 正视(視)某人 (zhèngshì mǒurén)
    to see sth through sb's eyes 从(從)某人的角度看 (cóng mǒurén de jiǎodù kàn)
    as far as the eye can see 就视(視)力所及的范(範)围(圍) (jiù shìlì suǒ jí de fànwéi)
    in the public eye 广(廣)为(為)人知 (guǎng wéi rén zhī)
    to see eye to eye (with sb) (与(與)某人)看法完全一致 ((yǔ mǒurén) kànfǎ wánquán yīzhì)
    to have an eye for sth 具有对(對)某物的鉴(鑑)赏(賞)力 (jùyǒu duì mǒuwù de jiànshǎnglì)
    there's more to this than meets the eye 并(並)不像看到的那么(麼)简(簡)单(單) (bìng bùxiàng kàndào de nàme jiǎndān)

packing

n (u)

  1. (= act) 打包 (dǎbāo)
  2. (= wrapping) 包装(裝)材料 (bāozhuāng cáiliào)
    to do one's/the packing 打包 (dǎbāo)

vt

  1. [clothes] 把 ... 打包 (bǎ ... dǎbāo)
  2. [suitcase, bag] 把 ... 装(裝)箱 (bǎ ... zhuāngxiāng)
  3. [hole] (with earth, cement) 填塞 (tiánsè)

vi

  1. 打点(點)行装(裝) (dǎdiǎn xíngzhuāng)

n (c)

  1. (= bundle)
    1. [of goods] 捆(梱) (kǔn)
    2. [of documents] 包 (bāo)
  2. (US) [of cigarettes] 包 (bāo)
    1. (= group) [of hounds] 群 (qún)
    2. [of people] 伙(夥) (huǒ)
  4. (= back pack) 背包 (bēibāo) (个(個), gè)
  5. [of cards] 副 (fù)
    to pack one's bags (fig) 卷(捲)铺(鋪)盖(蓋)走人 (juǎn pūgài zǒurén)
    to pack sb/sth into sth (= cram) 把某人/某物塞满(滿)某物 (bǎ mǒurén/mǒuwù sāimǎn mǒuwù)
    to pack sth into/around sth (= compress) 把某物塞进(進)某物/在某物周围(圍)压(壓)紧(緊) (bǎ mǒuwù sāijìn mǒuwù/zài mǒuwù zhōuwéi yājǐn)
    to send sb packing (inf) 把某人赶(趕)走 (bǎ mǒurén gǎnzǒu)

bronze

n

  1. (u) (= metal) 青铜(銅) (qīngtóng)
  2. (c) (= sculpture) 青铜(銅)像 (qīngtóngxiàng) (尊, zūn)
  3. (c) (Sport) (also bronze medal)
    1. 铜(銅)牌 (tóngpái) (块(塊), kuài)

adj

  1. (in colour) 古铜(銅)色的 (gǔtóngsè de)

divert

vt

  1. (= re-route) [traffic, plane] 使绕(繞)道行驶(駛) (shǐ ràodào xíngshǐ)
  2. [money, resources] 转(轉)移 (zhuǎnyí)
  3. (= amuse) 使欢(歡)娱(娛) (shǐ huānyú)
    to divert (sb's) attention from sth 转(轉)移(某人)对(對)某事的注意力 (zhuǎnyí (mǒurén) duì mǒushì de zhùyìlì)

greenhouse

n (c)

  1. 暖房 (nuǎnfáng) (间(間), jiān)

cpd

  1. [gas, emissions] 温(溫)室 (wēnshì)

hallmark

n (c)

  1. (on metal) 纯(純)度印记(記) (chúndù yìnjì) (个(個), gè)
  2. [of writer, artist, style] 特征(徵) (tèzhēng) (种(種), zhǒng)

instruct

vt

  1. (= tell)
    to instruct sb to do sth 命令某人做某事 (mìnglìng mǒurén zuò mǒushì)
  2. (= teach)
    to instruct sb in sth 教某人某事 (jiāo mǒurén mǒushì)

rally

n (c)

  1. (= public meeting) 集会(會) (jíhuì) (次, cì)
  2. (Aut) 拉力赛(賽) (lālìsài) (场(場), chǎng)
  3. (Tennis) 连(連)续(續)对(對)打 (liánxù duìdǎ) (局, jú)

vt

  1. [support] 集合 (jíhé)

vi

  1. (= unite) 联(聯)合 (liánhé)
  2. [sick person] 康复(復) (kāngfù)
  3. [Stock Exchange] 回升 (huíshēng)

rotating

adj

  1. [movement] 旋转(轉)的 (xuánzhuǎn de)
  2. [drum, mirror] 可旋转(轉)的 (kě xuánzhuǎn de)

vt

  1. (= spin) 转(轉)动(動) (zhuàndòng)
  2. (= change round) [crops] 轮(輪)种(種) (lúnzhòng)

vi

  1. (= revolve) 旋转(轉) (xuánzhuǎn)
  2. (= take turns) 轮(輪)换(換) (lúnhuàn)

sparse

adj

  1. [vegetation, traffic] 稀少的 (xīshǎo de)
  2. [hair] 稀疏的 (xīshū de)

collector

n (c)

  1. [of art, stamps etc] 收藏家 (shōucángjiā) (位, wèi)
  2. tax/debt collector 收税(稅)/讨(討)债(債)员(員) (shōushuì/tǎozhàiyuán)
    a collector's item 一件收藏品 (yī jiàn shōucángpǐn)

dry

adj

  1. [ground, clothes, paint] 干(乾)的 (gān de)
  2. [climate, weather, day] 干(乾)燥的 (gānzào de)
  3. [skin, hair] 干(乾)枯的 (gānkū de)
  4. (= empty) [lake, riverbed, well] 干(乾)涸的 (gānhé de)
  5. [wine, sherry] 不甜的 (bù tián de)
  6. [humour, account] 装(裝)成正经(經)的 (zhuāngchéng zhèngjing de)
  7. (= uninteresting) [lecture, subject, style] 枯燥无(無)味的 (kūzào wúwèi de)

vt

  1. [clothes, hair] 把 ... 弄干(乾) (bǎ ... nònggān)

vi

  1. [paint, washing] 变(變)干(乾) (biàngān)
    on dry land 在陆(陸)地上 (zài lùdì shang)
    to dry (up) the dishes 擦干(乾)碗碟 (cāgān wǎndié)
    to dry one's hands/hair 擦干(乾)手/头(頭)发(髮) (cāgān shǒu/tóufa)
    to dry one's eyes 擦干(乾)眼泪(淚) (cāgān yǎnlèi)

harness

n (c)

  1. (for horse, dog etc) 挽(輓)具 (wǎnjù) (副, fù)
  2. (= safety harness) 安全带(帶) (ānquándài) (根, gēn)

vt

  1. [resources, energy] 利用 (lìyòng)
  2. [horse, dog] 套上 (tàoshàng)

immature

adj

  1. [organ, organism] 发(發)育未全的 (fāyù wèi quán de)
  2. (= childish) [person, behaviour] 不成熟的 (bù chéngshú de)

nutrient

n (c)

  1. 营(營)养(養) (yíngyǎng)

adj

  1. 有营(營)养(養)的 (yǒu yíngyǎng de)

particular

adj

  1. (= specific) [person, thing, time, place] 特定的 (tèdìng de)
  2. (= special) 特有的 (tèyǒu de)
  3. (= great) 特别(別)的 (tèbié de)

Venus

n

  1. (= planet) 金星 (Jīnxīng)

ancestor

n (c)

  1. 祖先 (zǔxiān) (位, wèi)

migrate

vi

  1. [person] 迁(遷)移 (qiānyí)
  2. [bird] 迁(遷)徙 (qiānxǐ)

saint

n (c)

  1. (Rel) 圣(聖)徒 (shèngtú) (位, wèi)
  2. (= good person) 圣(聖)人 (shèngrén)
    he's no saint 他并(並)不是十全十美 (tā bìng bùshì shí quán shí měi)

abbr

  1. (= south) 南方 (nánfāng)
  2. (= small) 小的 (xiǎo de)
  3. Word forms:pl SS
    (= saint) 圣(聖)徒 (shèngtú)

abbr

  1. (= street) 街 (jiē)
  2. Word forms:pl SS
    (= saint) 圣(聖)人 (shèngrén)

conquer

vt

  1. [country, enemy] 征服 (zhēngfú)
  2. [fear, feelings, problem] 克服 (kèfú)

field

n (c)

  1. (= grassland) 草地 (cǎodì) (块(塊), kuài)
  2. (cultivated) 田地 (tiándì) (片, piàn)
  3. (Sport, = pitch) 场(場)地 (chǎngdì) (块(塊), kuài)
  4. (= subject, area of interest) 领(領)域 (lǐngyù) (个(個), gè)
  5. (= range) [of gravitation, magnetism] 场(場) (chǎng)
  6. (Min) 矿(礦)区(區) (kuàngqū)
  7. (Comput) 字段 (zìduàn) (个(個), gè)

vi

  1. (Cricket) 接球 (jiēqiú)

cpd

  1. [study, trip] 实(實)地 (shídì)
    the field (= competitors, entrants) 全体(體)出场(場)参(參)赛(賽)者 (quántǐ chūchǎng cānsàizhě)
    to lead the field (Sport) 领(領)头(頭) (lǐngtóu) (fig) 一马(馬)当(當)先 (yī mǎ dāng xiān)
    field of vision 视(視)野 (shìyě)
    to have a field day 忙得不亦乐(樂)乎 (máng de bù yì lè hū)

Mars

n

  1. (= planet) 火星 (Huǒxīng)

vt

  1. (= spoil) 毁(毀)坏(壞) (huǐhuài)

petroleum

n (u)

  1. 石油 (shíyóu)

travel

n (u)

  1. (= travelling) 旅行 (lǚxíng)

vi

  1. [person] 前往 (qiánwǎng)
  2. [light, sound, news] 传(傳)播 (chuánbō)

vt

  1. [distance] 走过(過) (zǒuguò)

chip

n (c)

  1. (Brit) 薯条(條) (shǔtiáo) (根, gēn)
    美 = (French) fry
  2. (US, = snack) 薯片 (shǔpiàn) (片, piàn)
    英 = crisp
  3. [of wood] 屑片 (xièpiàn)
  4. [of glass, stone] 碎片 (suìpiàn)
  5. (in glass, cup etc) 缺口 (quēkǒu)
  6. (for gambling) 筹(籌)码(碼) (chóumǎ)
  7. (Comput) (also microchip) 集成电(電)路片 (jíchéngdiànlù piàn) (块(塊), kuài)

vt

  1. [cup, plate] 碰出缺口 (pèngchū quēkǒu)
    to have a chip on one's shoulder (inf) 持寻(尋)衅(釁)的态(態)度 (chí xúnxìn de tàidu)
    he's a chip off the old block (inf) 他和他老子一样(樣) (tā hé tā lǎozi yīyàng)
    when the chips are down (inf) 当(當)危急关(關)头(頭) (dāng wēijí guāntóu)

humor

n

  1. = humour

n (u)

  1. 幽默 (yōumò)

vt

  1. [person] 迎合 (yínghé)
    sense of humour 幽默感 (yōumògǎn)
    to be in good/bad humour 情绪(緒)好/不好 (qíngxù hǎo/bù hǎo)

indulge

vt

  1. [desire, passion] 纵(縱)情享受 (zòngqíng xiǎngshòu)
  2. [person, child] 纵(縱)容 (zòngróng)

monarch

n (c)

  1. 君主 (jūnzhǔ)

assembly

n

  1. (c) (= meeting) 集会(會) (jíhuì) (个(個), gè)
  2. (c) (= institution) 议(議)会(會) (yìhuì)
  3. (u) (= construction) [of vehicles] 装(裝)配 (zhuāngpèi)
  4. (c/u) (in school) 集合 (jíhé) (次, cì)

awakening

n (c)

  1. 觉(覺)醒 (juéxǐng)
    a rude awakening 猛然醒悟 (měngrán xǐngwù)

fieldwork

n (u)

  1. (= research) 实(實)地考察 (shídì kǎochá)

lessen

vi

  1. 减(減)少 (jiǎnshǎo)

vt

  1. 使减(減)少 (shǐ jiǎnshǎo)

ridge

n (c)

  1. 隆起 (lóngqǐ) (个(個), gè)
  2. [of hill] 脊 (jǐ) (个(個), gè)

swallow

n (c)

  1. (= bird) 燕子 (yànzi) (只, zhī)
  2. [of food, drink] 吞咽(嚥) (tūnyàn)

vt

  1. [food, drink, pills] 吞下 (tūnxià)
  2. [story, statement] 轻(輕)信 (qīngxìn)

vi

  1. 吞咽(嚥) (tūnyàn)
    to swallow one's pride 放下架子 (fàngxià jiàzi)

antibody

n (c)

  1. 抗体(體) (kàngtǐ)

assimilate

vt

  1. (= learn) [ideas, methods etc] 吸收 (xīshōu)
  2. to be assimilated [immigrants] 同化 (tónghuà)

vi

  1. [immigrants] 同化 (tónghuà)

West Indies

n pl

  1. the West Indies 西印度群岛(島) (Xīyìndù Qúndǎo)

messenger

n (c)

  1. 通信员(員) (tōngxìnyuán) (位, wèi)

am

vb

  1. see be

abbr

  1. (= amplitude modulation) 调(調)幅 (tiáofú)

vi

  1. (with complement) 是 (shì)
    I'm English/Chinese 我是英国(國)人/中国(國)人 (wǒ shì Yīngguórén/Zhōngguórén)
    she's tall/pretty 她长(長)得高/漂亮 (tā zhǎngde gāo/piàoliang)
    I'm tired/hot 我累了/很热(熱) (wǒ lèi le/hěnrè)
    she's hungry/thirsty 她饿(餓)了/渴了 (tā è le/kě le)
    your hair's wet 你的头(頭)发(髮)湿(濕)了 (nǐ de tóufa shī le)
    he's a doctor 他是医(醫)生 (tā shì yīshēng)
    this is my mother 这(這)是我妈(媽)妈(媽) (zhèshì wǒ māma)
    who is it? 是谁(誰)啊？ (shì shuí a?)
    it's only me/the postman 是我/邮(郵)递(遞)员(員)啊 (shì wǒ/yóudìyuán a)
    it was Diana who paid the bill 是黛安娜付的账(賬)单(單) (shì Dài'ānnà fù de zhàngdān)
    2 and 2 are 4 2加2等于(於)4 (èr jiā èr děngyú sì)
    be careful/quiet! 当(當)心/安静(靜)！ (dāngxīn/ānjìng!)
  2. (referring to time, date) 是 (shì)
    it's 5 o'clock 现(現)在是5点(點)钟(鐘) (xiànzài shì wǔ diǎn zhōng)
    it's the 28th of April, it's April 28th 今天是4月28日 (jīntiān shì sì yuè èrshíbā rì)
  3. (describing weather)
    it's hot/cold 天热(熱)/冷 (tiān rè/lěng)
    it's foggy/wet 天有雾(霧)/天气(氣)潮湿(濕) (tiān yǒu wù/tiānqì cháoshī)
    it's windy today 今天有风(風) (jīntiān yǒu fēng)
  4. (talking about health)
    how are you? 你身体(體)怎么(麼)样(樣)？ (nǐ shēntǐ zěnmeyàng?)
    I'm fine, thanks 我很好，谢(謝)谢(謝) (wǒ hěn hǎo, xièxiè)
    I'm better now 我现(現)在好多了 (wǒ xiànzài hǎo duō le)
  5. (talking about age) 有 (yǒu)
    how old are you? 你多大了？ (nǐ duō dà le?)
    I'm 16 (years old) 我16(岁(歲)) (wǒ shíliù (suì))
    I'll be 18 on Friday 星期五我就18岁(歲)了 (xīngqīwǔ wǒ jiù shíbā suì le)
  6. (talking about place) 在 (zài)
    Madrid is in Spain 马(馬)德里在西班牙 (Mǎdélǐ zài Xībānyá)
    it's on the table 在桌上 (zài zhuōshang)
    the supermarket isn't far from here 超市离(離)这(這)儿(兒)不远(遠) (chāoshì lí zhèr bù yuǎn)
    I won't be here tomorrow 我明天不在这(這)儿(兒) (wǒ míngtiān bùzài zhèr)
    have you been to Beijing? 你去过(過)北京吗(嗎)？ (nǐ qùguo Běijīng ma?)
    we've been here for ages 我们(們)已经(經)在这(這)里(裡)好久了 (wǒmen yǐjīng zài zhèlǐ hǎojiǔ le)
    where have you been? 你去哪儿(兒)了？ (nǐ qù nǎr le?)
    has the postman been yet? 邮(郵)递(遞)员(員)来(來)过(過)了吗(嗎)？ (yóudìyuán láiguole ma?)
    the meeting will be in the canteen 会(會)议(議)将(將)在食堂举(舉)行 (huìyì jiāng zài shítáng jǔxíng)
  7. (referring to distance) 有 (yǒu)
    it's 10 km to the village 这(這)儿(兒)离(離)村庄(莊)有10公里 (zhèr lí cūnzhuāng yǒu shí gōnglǐ)
    it's 20 miles from here to London 从(從)这(這)儿(兒)到伦(倫)敦有20英里 (cóng zhèr dào Lúndūn yǒu èrshí yīnglǐ)
  8. (= cost) 花 (huā)
    how much was the meal? 这(這)顿(頓)饭(飯)花了多少钱(錢)？ (zhè dùn fàn huāle duōshao qián?)
    that'll be £5 please 请(請)付5英镑(鎊) (qǐngfù wǔ yīngbàng)
    these trousers are only £30 这(這)条(條)裤(褲)子仅(僅)仅(僅)30英镑(鎊) (zhè tiáo kùzi jǐnjǐn sānshí yīngbàng)
  9. (linking clauses) 是 (shì)
    the problem is that ... 问(問)题(題)是 ... (wèntí shì ... )
    the fact is that ... 事实(實)是 ... (shìshí shì ... )
  10. (= exist, occur etc) 存在 (cúnzài)
    the best singer that ever was 曾经(經)有过(過)的最好的歌手 (céngjīng yǒuguo de zuì hǎo de gēshǒu)
    is there a God? 存在上帝吗(嗎)？ (cúnzài Shàngdì ma?)
    be that as it may 即使如此 (jíshǐ rúcǐ)
  11. (assessing a situation)
    it is likely that he'll resign 很可能他将(將)辞(辭)职(職) (hěn kěnéng tā jiāng cízhí)
    it is difficult for me to complain 我很难(難)抱怨 (wǒ hěn nán bàoyuàn)

aux vb

  1. (forming continuous tenses)
    what are you doing? 你在干(幹)什么(麼)？ (nǐ zài gàn shénme?)
    it is raining 天下着(著)雨 (tiān xiàzhe yǔ)
    people are using their cars too much 人们(們)正在过(過)多地使用汽车(車) (rénmen zhèngzài guòduō de shǐyòng qìchē)
    they're coming tomorrow 他们(們)明天来(來) (tāmen míngtiān lái)
  2. (forming passives)
    to be murdered 被谋(謀)杀(殺) (bèi móushā)
    he was killed in a car crash 他在一场(場)车(車)祸(禍)中丧(喪)生 (tā zài yī chǎng chēhuò zhōng sàngshēng)
    the building was designed by a famous architect 这(這)座建筑(築)由一位著名的建筑(築)师(師)设(設)计(計) (zhè zuò jiànzhù yóu yī wèi zhùmíng de jiànzhùshī shèjì)
    the box had been opened 盒子已被打开(開)了 (hézi yǐ bèi dǎkāi le)
  3. (with "to" infinitive)
    the house is to be sold 房子将(將)要出售 (fángzi jiāng yào chūshòu)
    what is to be done? 我们(們)该(該)怎么(麼)办(辦)？ (wǒmen gāi zěnmebàn?)
    these flowers are to be found all over the country 这(這)些花在全国(國)都能看得到 (zhèxiē huā zài quánguó dōunéng kàndedào)
    the thief was nowhere to be seen 小偷不知去向 (xiǎotōu bù zhī qùxiàng)
  4. (in tag questions)
    it was fun, wasn't it? 有意思，是不是？ (yǒu yìsi, shì bù shì?)
    it wasn't good timing, was it? 时(時)间(間)选(選)得不太好，是不是？ (Shíjiān xuǎn de bù tài hǎo, shì bù shì?)
    he's good-looking, isn't he? 他长(長)得不错(錯)，是不是？ (tā zhǎng de bùcuò, shì bù shì?)
    so you're back again, are you? 所以你又回来(來)了，是不是？ (suǒyǐ nǐ yòu huílai le, shì bù shì?)
  5. (in short answers)
    "was it where I said?" — "yes, it was/no, it wasn't" "就在我说(說)的地方吗(嗎)？" "是/不是" ("jiù zài wǒ shuō de dìfang ma?" "shì/bù shì")
    "you're all right, aren't you?" — "yes, I am/no, I'm not" "你还(還)好，是不是？" "是的，我还(還)好/不，我不好" ("nǐ hái hǎo, shì bù shì? " "shì de, wǒ hái hǎo/bù, wǒ bù hǎo")

adv abbr

  1. (= ante meridiem) 上午 (shàngwǔ)

plentiful

adj

  1. [food, supply, resources] 大量的 (dàliàng de)

ride

n (c)

  1. (in car, on bicycle) 兜风(風) (dōufēng) (次, cì)
  2. (on horse, bus, train) 出行 (chūxíng) (次, cì)
  3. (= track, path) 供骑(騎)马(馬)用的小径(徑) (gōng qímǎ yòng de xiǎojìng)

vi

  1. (= travel)
    1. (on horse) 骑(騎)马(馬) (qímǎ)
    2. (on bicycle) 骑(騎)车(車) (qíchē)
    3. (in car) 乘坐 (chéngzuò)

vt

  1. [horse, bicycle, motorcycle] 骑(騎) (qí)
  2. [distance] 行进(進) (xíngjìn)
    a horse/car ride 骑(騎)马(馬)/乘车(車)出游(遊) (qímǎ/chéngchē chūyóu)
    to go for a ride 出游(遊) (chūyóu)
    to give sb a ride (US) 让(讓)某人搭车(車) (ràng mǒurén dāchē)
    to take sb for a ride (fig) 欺骗(騙)某人 (qīpiàn mǒurén)
    to be riding high 声(聲)名显(顯)赫 (shēngmíng xiǎnhè)
    a rough ride (inf) 艰(艱)难(難)的处(處)境 (jiānnán de chǔjìng)

stunning

adj

  1. (= impressive) 惊(驚)人的 (jīngrén de)
  2. (= beautiful) [person, dress etc] 极漂亮的 (jí piàoliang de)

vt

  1. (= shock) 使震惊(驚) (shǐ zhènjīng)
  2. (= daze) 使昏迷 (shǐ hūnmí)

suspend

vt

  1. (= hang) 悬(懸)挂(掛) (xuánguà)
  2. (= delay, stop) 暂(暫)停 (zàntíng)
  3. (from employment) 暂(暫)令停职(職) (zànlìng tíngzhí)

chase

vt

  1. (= pursue) 追赶(趕) (zhuīgǎn)
  2. to chase sb off one's land/away from a place 将(將)某人赶(趕)出某人的土地/从(從)某处(處)赶(趕)走 (jiāng mǒurén gǎnchū mǒurén de tǔdì/cóng mǒuchù gǎnzǒu)
  3. (= seek) [job, money, opportunity] 寻(尋)找 (xúnzhǎo)

n (c)

  1. (= pursuit) 追逐 (zhuīzhú) (阵(陣), zhèn)

diamond

n (c)

  1. (= gem) 钻(鑽)石 (zuànshí) (颗, kē)
  2. (= shape) 菱形 (língxíng) (个(個), gè)

endurance

n (u)

  1. 忍耐 (rěnnài)

gloss

n

  1. (s/u) (= shine) 光泽(澤) (guāngzé)
  2. (c/u) (also gloss paint) 光泽(澤)涂(塗)料 (guāngzé túliào)

inherit

vt

  1. [property, money] 继(繼)承 (jìchéng)
  2. [characteristic, disease] 由遗(遺)传(傳)而得 (yóu yíchuán ér dé)
  3. [situation] 接手 (jiēshǒu)

avail

vt

  1. to avail o.s. of sth [offer, opportunity, service] 利用某物 (lìyòng mǒuwù)

flora

n (u/pl)

  1. 植物群 (zhíwùqún)

graze

vi

  1. [animal] 吃草 (chī cǎo)

vt

  1. (= scrape) [arm, leg, knee] 擦伤(傷) (cāshāng)
  2. (= touch lightly) 擦过(過) (cāguò)

n

  1. (= wound) 擦伤(傷) (cāshāng)

honey

n (u)

  1. (= food) 蜂蜜 (fēngmì)
  2. (esp US, inf, = darling) 宝(寶)贝(貝) (bǎobèi)

predicament

n (c)

  1. 困境 (kùnjìng)
    to be in a predicament 处(處)于(於)困境之中 (chǔyú kùnjìng zhī zhōng)

rabbit

n

  1. (c) (= animal) 兔子 (tùzi) (只, zhī)
  2. (u) (= meat) 兔肉 (tùròu)

vi

  1. (Brit, inf) (also to rabbit on) 唠(嘮)叨 (láodao)

ton

n (c)

  1. (Brit) 英吨(噸) (yīngdūn)
  2. (US) (also short ton) 美吨(噸) (měidūn)
  3. (= metric ton) 公吨(噸) (gōngdūn)
    tons of (inf) 大量的 (dàliàng de)

veto

n (c)

  1. 否决(決) (fǒujué)

vt

  1. 否决(決) (fǒujué)
    power of veto 否决(決)权(權) (fǒujuéquán)
    to put a veto on 禁止 (jìnzhǐ)

adjective

n (c)

  1. 形容词(詞) (xíngróngcí) (个(個), gè)

analogy

n (c/u)

  1. 相似 (xiāngsì)
    to draw an analogy between 找出 ... 之间(間)的相似之处(處) (zhǎochū ... zhījiān de xiāngsì zhī chù)
    by analogy 用类(類)推法 (yòng lèituīfǎ)

commence

vt, vi

  1. 开(開)始 (kāishǐ)

impractical

adj

  1. [idea, plan] 不切实(實)际(際)的 (bù qiè shíjì de)
  2. [person] 实(實)践(踐)能力差的 (shíjiàn nénglì chà de)

nucleus

n (c)

  1. [of atom, cell] 核 (hé)
  2. [of group] 核心人物 (héxīn rénwù) (位, wèi)

reservation

n

  1. (c) (= booking) 预(預)定 (yùdìng) (个(個), gè)
  2. (c/u) (= doubt) 保留 (bǎoliú)
  3. (c) (= land) 保留地 (bǎoliúdì)
    with reservation(s) (doubts) 持保留意见(見) (chí bǎoliú yìjiàn)
    to make a reservation (in hotel, restaurant, on train) 预(預)定 (yùdìng)

earthquake

n (c)

  1. 地震 (dìzhèn) (次, cì)

vi

  1. (= tremble) 战(戰)栗(慄) (zhànlì)

n (c)

  1. (inf) (also earthquake) 地震 (dìzhèn)

mayor

n (c)

  1. 市长(長) (shìzhǎng) (位, wèi)

misplace

vt

  1. (= mislay) 误(誤)置 (wùzhì)

oak

n

  1. (c) (also oak tree) 橡树(樹) (xiàngshù) (棵, kē)
  2. (u) (= wood) 橡木 (xiàngmù)

cpd

  1. [furniture, door] 橡木 (xiàngmù)

pipeline

n (c)

  1. (for oil, gas) 管道 (guǎndào) (根, gēn)
    to be in the pipeline 在酝(醞)酿(釀)中 (zài yùnniàng zhōng)

soluble

adj

  1. 可溶的 (kěróng de)

abolish

vt

  1. [system, practice] 废(廢)止 (fèizhǐ)

bilingual

adj

  1. [dictionary, secretary] 双(雙)语(語)的 (shuāngyǔ de)
    to be bilingual 能讲(講)两(兩)国(國)语(語)言的 (néng jiǎng liǎng guó yǔyán de)

compass

n (c)

  1. (for finding direction) 指南针(針) (zhǐnánzhēn) (个(個), gè)
  2. (for drawing circles) (also pair of compasses) 圆(圓)规(規) (yuánguī) (个(個), gè)
    beyond/within the compass of (frm) 超出/在 ... 的范(範)围(圍) (chāochū/zài ... de fànwéi)

proclaim

vt

  1. 宣告 (xuāngào)
    to proclaim that ... 声(聲)明 ... (shēngmíng ... )
    to proclaim o.s. sth 公开(開)宣称(稱)自己的某立场(場) (gōngkāi xuānchēng zìjǐ de mǒu lìchǎng)

turbulence

n (u)

  1. 猛烈而不稳(穩)定的水流/气(氣)流 (měngliè ér bù wěndìng de shuǐliú/qìliú)

undeniable

adj

  1. [fact, evidence] 不可否认(認)的 (bù kě fǒurèn de)

amusement

n

  1. (u) (= mirth) 愉悦(悅) (yúyuè)
  2. (u) (= entertainment) 娱(娛)乐(樂) (yùlè)
  3. (c) (= pastime) 消遣 (xiāoqiǎn)

dental

adj

  1. [treatment, hygiene etc] 牙齿(齒)的 (yáchǐ de)

flock

n (c)

  1. [of sheep, birds] 群 (qún)
  2. (o.f., Rel) 同一牧师管辖下的全体教徒

vi

  1. [people] 成群结(結)队(隊) (chéngqún jiéduì)
    flocks of journalists 众(眾)多的新闻(聞)记(記)者 (zhòngduō de xīnwén jìzhě)

verge

n (c)

  1. (Brit) [of road] 路边(邊)草带(帶) (lùbiān cǎodài)
  2. to be on the verge of sth/of doing sth 即将(將)发(發)生某事/即将(將)做某事 (jíjiāng fāshēng mǒushì/jíjiāng zuò mǒushì)

aspire

vi

  1. to aspire to 有志于(於) (yǒuzhì yú)

childbirth

n (u)

  1. 分娩 (fēnmiǎn)

density

n (c/u)

  1. 密度 (mìdù)

geological

adj

  1. 地质(質)的 (dìzhì de)

lust

n

  1. (u) (sexual) 性欲(慾) (xìngyù)
  2. (u/s)
    lust for money/power/revenge 金钱(錢)/权(權)力/复(復)仇欲(慾) (jīnqiān/quánlì/fùchóu yù)

vi

  1. to lust after sb 贪(貪)恋(戀)某人 (tānliàn mǒurén)
  2. to lust for or after sth [power, money] 对(對)某物有强(強)烈的欲(慾)望 (duì mǒuwù yǒu qiángliè de yùwàng)

trustworthy

adj

  1. [person] 可靠的 (kěkào de)

uprising

n (c)

  1. 起义(義) (qǐyì)

bat

n (c)

  1. (= animal) 蝙蝠 (biānfú) (只, zhī)
  2. (for cricket, baseball) 球板/棒 (qiúbǎn/bàng) (只, zhī)
  3. (Brit, for table tennis) 球拍 (qiúpāi) (只, zhī)
    美 = paddle

vi

  1. (Cricket, Baseball) 用板/棒击(擊)球 (yòng bǎn/bàng jīqiú)

bicycle

n (c)

  1. 自行车(車) (zìxíngchē) (辆(輛), liàng)
    to ride a bicycle 骑(騎)自行车(車) (qí zìxíngchē)

infrequent

adj

  1. [buses] 稀少的 (xīshǎo de)
  2. [visits] 不经(經)常的 (bù jīngcháng de)

n

  1. (= Miss or Mrs)
    Ms Smith 史密斯女士 (Shǐmìsī nǚshì)

n abbr

  1. (US) (= Master of Science) = MSc
  2. (= multiple sclerosis) 多发(發)性硬化 (duōfāxìng yìnghuà)

n

  1. (= letter) 英语的第十三个字母

abbr

  1. (= male) 男性 (nánxìng)

slender

adj

  2. [chance, means, majority] 微弱的 (wēiruò de)

n (c/u)

  1. 胶(膠) (jiāo) (种(種), zhǒng)

vt

  1. 粘贴(貼) (zhāntiē)
    to glue sth together 把某物粘在一起 (bǎ mǒuwù zhān zài yīqǐ)
    to glue sth to sth 把某物粘在某物上 (bǎ mǒuwù zhān zài mǒuwù shang)
    to be glued to the television 紧(緊)盯着(著)电(電)视(視) (jǐndīngzhe diànshì)

vt

  1. (= examine) 检(檢)查 (jiǎnchá)
  2. (officially) [premises, equipment, troops] 视(視)察 (shìchá)

space

n

  1. (c/u) (= gap, place) 空隙 (kòngxì) (个(個), gè)
  2. (c/u) (= room) 空间(間) (kōngjiān)
  3. (u) (beyond Earth) 太空 (tàikōng)

cpd

  1. 太空 (tàikōng)

vt

  1. [text, visits] (also space out) 把 ... 分隔开(開) (bǎ ... fēngé kāi)
  2. [payments] 把 ... 均匀(勻)分配 (bǎ ... jūnyún fēnpèi)
    to clear a space for sth 为(為)某物腾(騰)地方 (wèi mǒuwù téng dìfang)
    in a short space of time (from now) 片刻后(後) (piànkè hòu) (in past) 很快 (hěn kuài)
    (with)in the space of an hour 在一小时(時)内(內) (zài yī xiǎoshí nèi)

vt

  1. [cloth] 织(織) (zhī)
  2. [basket] 编(編) (biān)

vi

  1. (pt, pp weaved)
    to weave in and out of/among 在 ... 中穿进(進)穿出/在 ... 中迂回(迴)行进(進) (zài ... zhōng chuānjìn chuānchū/zài ... zhōng yūhuí xíngjìn)

n (c)

  1. 织(織)法 (zhīfǎ)

gulf

  1. (c) (= bay) 海湾(灣) (hǎiwān) (个(個), gè)

    to have a heart/liver transplant 进(進)行心脏(臟)/肝脏(臟)移植 (jìnxíng xīnzàng/gānzàng yízhí)

    1. (for DIY etc) 钻(鑽) (zuàn) (个(個), gè)

  2. (= train) [troops] 训(訓)练(練) (xùnliàn)
  3. [pupils] (in grammar, maths, singing etc) 训(訓)练(練) (xùnliàn)

vi

  2. to drill (for) [oil, water, gas] 钻(鑽)(探某物) (zuān (tàn mǒuwù))

  1. (c) (= person) 清洁(潔)工 (qīngjié gōng) (位, wèi)
  2. (c/u) (= substance) 清洁(潔)剂(劑) (qīngjié jì) (种(種), zhǒng)

adj

    1. [place, surface, clothes etc] 干(乾)净(淨)的 (gānjìng de)
    2. [water] 清洁(潔)的 (qīngjié de)
  2. (in habits) [person, animal] 爱(愛)清洁(潔)的 (ài qīngjié de)
  3. (= fair) [fight, contest] 公正的 (gōngzhèng de)
  4. (= not offensive) [joke, story] 纯(純)净(淨)的 (chúnjìng de)
  5. (= spotless) [record, reputation] 清白的 (qīngbái de)
  6. (= well-defined) [edge, line] 平整的 (píngzhěng de)
  7. (Med) [fracture] 边(邊)缘(緣)整齐(齊)的 (biānyuán zhěngqí de)

vt

  1. [car, cooker] 弄干(乾)净(淨) (nòng gānjìng)
  2. [room] 打扫(掃) (dǎsǎo)

adv

  1. (inf)
    he clean forgot 他忘得一干(乾)二净(淨) (tā wàng de yī gān èr jìng)

  2. (= made of metal) 金属(屬)制(製)的 (jīnshǔzhì de)
  3. [paint, colour] 像金属(屬)的 (xiàng jīnshǔ de)
  4. [taste] 有金属(屬)腥味的 (yǒu jīnshǔ xīngwèi de)

adv

  2. [signal] 声(聲)音的 (shēngyīn de)

astute

adj

  1. [person, decision] 精明的 (jīngmíng de)

elevate

vt

  2. (in amount, intensity) 提高 (tígāo)
  3. (physically) 使上升 (shǐ shàngshēng)

inflexible

adj

  1. [rule, system] 固定的 (gùdìng de)
  2. [person] 不灵(靈)活的 (bù línghuó de)
  3. [object, material] 不可弯(彎)曲的 (bù kě wānqū de)

  1. (c) (also pine tree) 松树(樹) (sōngshù) (棵, kē)
  2. (u) (= wood) 松木 (sōngmù)

  1. to pine (for sb/sth) [person, place] 朝思暮想(某人/某物) (zhāoxī mùxiǎng (mǒurén/mǒuwù))

  1. 吵架 (chǎojià) (场(場), chǎng)

vi

  1. 争(爭)吵 (zhēngchǎo)
    to have a quarrel with sb 跟某人争(爭)吵 (gēn mǒurén zhēngchǎo)
    I can't quarrel with that 我对(對)此无(無)可争(爭)辩(辯) (wǒ duì cǐ wú kě zhēngbiàn)

  1. 拍卖(賣) (pāimài)

adj

  1. [person, look] 有同情心的 (yǒu tóngqíngxīn de)
    on compassionate grounds 出于(於)特殊照顾(顧) (chūyú tèshū zhàogù)

exaggeration

n (c/u)

  1. 夸张(張) (kuāzhāng)

formality

n

  1. (c) 形式 (xíngshì) (种(種), zhǒng)
  2. (u) (= politeness) 礼(禮)节(節) (lǐjié)

humorous

adj

  1. [remark, book, person] 幽默的 (yōumò de)

indulgence

n

  1. (u) (= leniency) 纵(縱)容 (zòngróng)
  2. (c) (= pleasure) 嗜好 (shìhào) (个(個), gè)

rebellious

adj

  1. [person] 叛逆的 (pànnì de)
  2. [behaviour] 反叛的 (fǎnpàn de)
  3. [politician] 反对(對)的 (fǎnduì de)

wavelength

n (c)

  1. (Rad, Phys) [of light, sound] 波长(長) (bōcháng)
    to be on the same wavelength 和谐(諧)融洽 (héxié róngqià)

archetypal

adj

  1. 典型的 (diǎnxíng de)

radioactive

adj

  1. 放射性的 (fàngshèxìng de)

sibling

n (c)

  1. 兄弟姐妹 (xiōngdì jiěmèi)
    sibling rivalry 手足相争(爭) (shǒuzú xiāng zhēng)

aboard

prep

  1. [ship, plane] 在 ... 上 (zài ... shang)

adv

  1. 在飞(飛)机(機)/船/火车(車)上 (zài fēijī/chuán/huǒchē shang)

advertise

vi

  1. (in newspaper, on television etc) 做广(廣)告 (zuò guǎnggào)

vt

  1. [product, event] 为(為) ... 做广(廣)告 (wèi ... zuò guǎnggào)
  2. [job] 刊登 (kāndēng)
    to advertise for sth/sb [staff, accommodation] 登广(廣)告征(徵)求某物/某人 (dēng guǎnggào zhēngqiú mǒuwù/mǒurén)

affinity

n

  1. (s) (= bond)
    to have an affinity with sb/sth 和某人/某物有亲(親)近感 (hé mǒurén/mǒuwù yǒu qīnjìngǎn)
  2. (c) (= resemblance) 相似 (xiāngsì)

aquatic

adj

  1. (= living in water) [plant, animal] 水生的 (shuǐshēng de)
  2. (= relating to water) [sports, studies] 水上的 (shuǐshàng de)

cubic

adj

  1. 立方的 (lìfāng de)
    a cubic metre 一立方米 (yí lìfāngmǐ)

deduce

vt

  1. 推断(斷) (tuīduàn)
    to deduce that ... 推断(斷) ... (tuīduàn ... )

diabetic

adj

  1. [person, patient] 患糖尿病的 (huàn tángniàobìng de)
  2. [coma] 糖尿病的 (tángniàobìng de)
  3. [chocolate, jam] 糖尿病患者食用的 (tángniàobìng huànzhě shíyòng de)

n (c)

  1. 糖尿病患者 (tángniàobìng huànzhě) (个(個), gè)

drawback

n (c)

  1. 欠缺 (qiànquē) (个(個), gè)

revolve

vi

  1. [wheel, propeller etc] 旋转(轉) (xuánzhuǎn)
    to revolve (a)round sth [earth, moon] 围(圍)绕(繞)某物旋转(轉) (wéirào mǒuwù xuánzhuǎn) [life, discussion] 以某物为(為)中心 (yǐ mǒuwù wéi zhōngxīn)

south-east

n

  1. 东(東)南 (dōngnán)

adj

  1. 东(東)南的 (dōngnán de)

adv

  1. 向东(東)南 (xiàng dōngnán)

abbr

  1. (= south-east) 东(東)南部 (dōngnánbù)

thesis

n (c)

  1. (for degree) 论(論)文 (lùnwén) (篇, piān)
  2. (= argument) 论(論)点(點) (lùndiǎn) (个(個), gè)

dive

vi

  1. [swimmer]
    1. (into water) 跳水 (tiàoshuǐ)
    2. (under water) 潜(潛)水 (qiánshuǐ)
  2. [bird] 俯冲(衝) (fǔchōng)
  3. [fish, submarine] 潜(潛)入水中 (qián rù shuǐ zhōng)
  4. to dive into/under sth (= leap) 钻(鑽)入某物中/下 (zuān rù mǒuwù zhōng/xià)
  5. to dive into sth [bag, drawer etc] 把手伸进(進)某物 (bǎ shǒu shēnjìn mǒuwù)

n (c)

  1. (into water) 跳水 (tiàoshuǐ) (次, cì)
  2. (underwater) 潜(潛)水 (qiánshuǐ)
  3. (inf, pej, = place) 下等娱(娛)乐(樂)场(場)所 (xiàděng yúlè chǎngsuǒ)
  4. (in football)
    to take a dive 假摔 (jiǎshuāi)

elephant

n (c)

  1. 大象 (dàxiàng) (头, tóu)

groundwork

n (u)

  1. (= preparation) 基础(礎) (jīchǔ)
    to lay the groundwork for sth 为(為)某事打下基础(礎) (wèi mǒushì dǎxià jīchǔ)

indictment

n

  1. (c) (= condemnation) 谴(譴)责(責) (qiǎnzé)
  2. (c/u) (esp US, Law) 起诉(訴) (qǐsù)

north-west

n

  1. 西北 (xīběi)

adj

  1. 西北的 (xīběi de)

adv

  1. 向西北 (xiàng xīběi)

abbr

  1. (= north-west) 西北 (xīběi)

vigilant

adj

  1. 警惕的 (jǐngtì de)

beard

n (c)

  1. 胡(鬍)须(鬚) (húxū) (根, gēn)

erratic

adj

  1. [behaviour, progress] 不规(規)则(則)的 (bù guīzé de)

gigantic

adj

  1. 庞(龐)大的 (pángdà de)

investigator

n (c)

  1. 调(調)查员(員) (diàocháyuán) (名, míng)

qualify

vi

  1. (= pass examinations) 取得资(資)格 (qǔdé zīgé)
  2. (in competition) 具备(備)资(資)格 (jùbèi zīgé)
  3. to qualify for sth (= be eligible for) 符合某事的条(條)件 (fúhé mǒushì de tiáojiàn)

vt

  1. to qualify sb for sth/to do sth 使某人对(對)某事/做某事有资(資)格 (shǐ mǒurén duì mǒushì/zuò mǒushì yǒu zīgé)
  2. (= modify) [statement] 缓(緩)和 (huǎnhé)
    to qualify as an engineer/a nurse etc 取得工程师(師)/护(護)士等的资(資)格 (qǔdé gōngchéngshī/hùshì děng de zīgé)

relinquish

vt

  1. [authority, control, claim] 放弃(棄) (fàngqì)

curriculum

n (c)

  1. (for all subjects) 全部课(課)程 (quánbù kèchéng)
  2. (for particular subject) 课(課)程 (kèchéng) (门(門), mén)

discard

vt

  1. [unwanted object] 丢(丟)弃(棄) (diūqì)
  2. [idea, plan, system] 抛(拋)弃(棄) (pāoqì)

duplicate

n (c)

  1. [of document, key] 复(複)制(製)品 (fùzhìpǐn) (件, jiàn)

adj

  1. [key, copy] 复(複)制(製)的 (fùzhì de)

vt

  1. (= repeat) [success, result] 重复(複) (chóngfù)
  2. (= copy) [document, tape] 复(複)制(製) (fùzhì)
  3. (= reuse, rehash) 重做 (chóngzuò)

fully-fledged

adj

  1. [member, atheist etc] 完全的 (wánquán de)

kick

vt

  1. [person, ball] 踢 (tī)

vi

  1. [person, horse] 踢 (tī)

n (c)

  1. (= blow from person, animal) 踢 (tī) (顿, dùn)
  2. (Sport) 踢 (tī)
  3. [of rifle] 反冲(衝) (fǎnchōng)
    to give sb a kick 踢某人 (tī mǒurén)
    to get a kick out of sth 从(從)某事中获(獲)得乐(樂)趣 (cóng mǒushì zhōng huòdé lèqù)
    to do sth for kicks (inf) 为(為)刺激而做某事 (wèi cìjī ér zuò mǒushì)
    to kick the habit (inf) 戒除恶(惡)习(習) (jièchú èxí)
    to kick the bucket (inf) 翘(翹)辫(辮)子 (qiào biànzi)
    I could have kicked myself! (inf) 我真后(後)悔！ (Wǒ zhēn hòuhuǐ!)

sympathy

n (u)

  1. 同情心 (tóngqíngxīn)

unfit

adj

  1. (physically) 不太健康的 (bù tài jiànkāng de)
    to be unfit for sth/to do sth 不胜(勝)任某事/不适(適)合做某事 (bù shèngrèn mǒushì/bù shìhé zuò mǒushì)
    unfit for work 身体(體)不佳无(無)法工作 (shēntǐ bù jiā wúfǎ gōngzuò)
    unfit for human consumption 不宜给(給)人食用 (bùyí gěi rén shíyòng)

Ecuador

n

  1. 厄瓜多尔(爾) (Èguāduō'ěr)

  2. [comment, analysis] 富有见(見)地的 (fùyǒu jiàndì de)

vt

  1. [soil, rock] 侵蚀(蝕) (qīnshí)
  2. (frm) [confidence, authority] 削弱 (xuēruò)

vi

  2. (frm) [confidence, authority] 削弱 (xuēruò)

fortunately

adv

  1. 幸运(運)的是 (xìngyùn de shì)

  1. 矿(礦)石 (kuàngshí) (堆, duī)

  1. 反应(應)器 (fǎnyìngqì) (个(個), gè)

  2. (c) (= novel, play) 讽(諷)刺作品 (fěngcì zuòpǐn)

cool

adj

  1. [water, breeze, evening, place] 凉(涼)的 (liáng de)
  2. (= light) [clothes] 凉(涼)爽的 (liángshuǎng de)
  3. (= calm, unemotional) 冷静(靜)的 (lěngjìng de)
  4. (= unfriendly) 冷淡的 (lěngdàn de)
  5. (inf)
    1. (= good) 顶(頂)呱呱的 (dǐngguāguā de)
    2. (= fashionable) 酷的 (kù de)

vt

  1. 使变(變)凉(涼) (shǐ biànliáng)

vi

  1. 冷下来(來) (lěngxiàlái)

artwork

n

  1. (u) (for advert, book etc) 插图(圖) (chātú) (张(張), zhāng)
  2. (c) (= work of art) 艺(藝)术(術)作品 (yìshù zuòpǐn) (件, jiàn)

dump

n (c)

  1. (= tip) (for rubbish) 垃圾场(場) (lājīchǎng) (个(個), gè)
  2. (inf, = pigsty, tip) 脏(髒)乱(亂)的地方 (zāngluàn de dìfang) (处, chù)
  3. (= store) (for ammunition, arms) 临(臨)时(時)存放处(處) (língshí cúnfàngchù)

vt

  1. (= put down) 丢(丟)下 (diūxià)
  2. (= get rid of) 倾(傾)倒 (qīngdào)
  3. [computer data] 转(轉)储(儲) (zhuǎnchǔ)
    to be down in the dumps (inf) 神情沮丧(喪) (shénqíng jǔsàng)
    "no dumping" "严(嚴)禁乱(亂)倒垃圾" ("yánjìn luàndào lājī")

zinc

n (u)

  1. 锌(鋅) (xīn)

crust

n (c)

  1. (on bread, pastry) 皮 (pí)
  2. (on snow, ice) 硬表层(層) (yìng biǎocéng)
    the earth's crust 地壳(殼) (dìqiào)

cynicism

n (u)

  1. 愤(憤)世嫉俗 (fèn shì jí sú)
    cynicism (about sth/sb) (对(對)某事/某人的)不信任感 ((duì mǒushì/mǒurén de) bùxìnrèngǎn)

vt

  1. [equipment, software] 安装(裝) (ānzhuāng)
  2. [official] 使 ... 就职(職) (shǐ ... jiùzhí)

adj

  1. [person] 怀(懷)旧(舊)的 (huáijiù de)
  2. [trip, memory, song, book] 令人怀(懷)旧(舊)的 (lìng rén huáijiù de)
    to be nostalgic about/for sth 怀(懷)恋(戀)某事物 (huáiliàn mǒushìwù)

discredit

vt

  1. [person, group] 使丧(喪)失名誉(譽) (shǐ sàngshī míngyù)
  2. [claim, idea] 使不可信 (shǐ bù kěxìn)

magnify

vt

  1. (= enlarge) [object] 放大 (fàngdà)
  2. (= amplify) [sound] 扩(擴)大 (kuòdà)
  3. (= increase) 加强(強) (jiāqiáng)

remembrance

n

  1. (= memory)
    in remembrance of 纪(紀)念 (jìniàn)
  2. (c/u) (= souvenir) [of place, event] 纪(紀)念物 (jìniànwù)

stack

n (c)

  1. (= pile) 堆 (duī)

vt

  1. [chairs, books etc] (also stack up) 把 ... 堆起来(來) (bǎ ... duī qǐlái)
    to be stacked with ... 堆满(滿)了 ... (duīmǎnle ... )
    stacks of time/money (Brit, inf) 大量时(時)间(間)/钱(錢) (dàliàng shíjiān/qián)
    the odds are stacked against them 他们(們)的胜(勝)算不大 (tāmen de shèngsuàn bù dà)

vanish

vi

  1. [person, aircraft] 消失 (xiāoshī)
  2. (= cease to exist) [tradition, system, species] 灭(滅)绝(絕) (mièjué)

n (c)

  1. (Elec) 电(電)灯(燈)泡 (diàndēngpào) (个(個), gè)
  2. (Bot) 球茎(莖) (qiújīng) (个(個), gè)

drill

n

  1. (c) (= tool, machine)
    1. (for DIY etc) 钻(鑽) (zuàn) (个(個), gè)
    2. [of dentist] 钻(鑽)头(頭) (zuàntóu) (个(個), gè)
    3. (for mining etc) 钻(鑽)孔器 (zuānkǒngqì)
  2. (u) (= fabric) 斜纹(紋)布 (xiéwénbù)
  3. (c) [(for fire, air raid)] 演习(習) (yǎnxí) (次, cì)

vt

  1. [hole] 在 ... 上钻(鑽)孔 (zài ... shang zuānkǒng)
  2. (= train) [troops] 训(訓)练(練) (xùnliàn)
  3. [pupils] (in grammar, maths, singing etc) 训(訓)练(練) (xùnliàn)

vi

  1. to drill (into) [wall, floor etc] (在 ... )钻(鑽)孔 ((zài ... ) zuānkǒng)
  2. to drill (for) [oil, water, gas] 钻(鑽)(探某物) (zuān (tàn mǒuwù))

  1. 动(動)物群 (dòngwùqún)

adj

  1. [regime, state] 极权(權)主义(義)的 (jíquán zhǔyì de)

n

  1. (c/u) (Bot) 茎(莖) (jīng)
  2. (u) (for furniture, baskets) 藤条(條) (téngtiáo)
  3. (c) (= stick) 手杖 (shǒuzhàng) (根, gēn)

vt

  1. (Scol) 用笞杖打 (yòng chīzhàng dǎ)
    to get or be given the cane (Scol) 被笞 (bèi chī)

n (c)

  1. (in stories) 小矮人 (xiǎo'ǎirén) (个(個), gè)
  2. (o.f., offensive, = small person) 矮子 (ǎizi)

adj

  1. [shrub, plant etc] 矮小的 (ǎixiǎo de)

vt

  1. 使相形见(見)绌(絀) (shǐ xiāng xíng jiàn chù)

n

  1. (u) 水银(銀) (shuǐyín)
  2. Mercury (Astron) 水星 (Shuǐxīng)
